GV03sb_05_u:1: devāśca vā asurāśca | ubhaye prājāpatyāḥ paspṛdhire tato 'surā atimānenaiva
GV03sb_05_u:5: atha devāḥ | anyo 'nyasminneva juhvataścerustebhyaḥ prajāpatirātmānam pradadau
GV03sb_05_u:8: te hocuḥ | kasya na idam bhaviṣyatīti te mama mametyeva na sampādayāṃ cakruste
GV03sb_05_u:9: hāsampādyocurājimevāsminnajāmahai sa yo na ujjeṣyati tasya na idam bhaviṣyatīti
GV03sb_05_u:12: sa bṛhaspatiḥ | savitārameva prasavāyopādhāvatsavitā vai devānām prasavitedam me
GV03sb_05_u:13: prasuva tvatprasūta idamujjayānīti tadasmai savitā prasavitā prāsuvattatsavitṛprasūta
GV03sb_05_u:14: udajayatsa idaṃ sarvamabhavatsa idaṃ sarvamudajayatprajāpatiṃ hyudajayatsarvamu
GV03sb_05_u:18: tadye ha sma purā vājapeyena yajante | etāṃ ha smaivordhvā diśamutkrāmanti tata
GV03sb_05_u:21: tenendro 'yajata | sa idaṃ sarvamabhavatsa idaṃ sarvamudajayatprajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_05_u:24: tadye ha sma purā vājapeyena yajante | etāṃ ha smaivordhvāṃ diśamutkrāmanti tata
GV03sb_05_u:27: sa yo vājapeyena yajate | sa idaṃ sarvam bhavati sa idaṃ sarvamujjayati prajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_05_u:30: tadāhuḥ | na vājapeyena yajeta sarvaṃ vā eṣa idamujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate
GV03sb_05_u:31: prajāpatiṃ hyujjayati sarvamu hyevedam prajāpatiḥ sa iha na kiṃ cana pariśinaṣṭi
GV03sb_05_u:34: tadu vai yajetaiva | ya evametaṃ yajñaṃ kLptaṃ vidyurṛkto yajuṣṭaḥ sāmato ye
GV03sb_05_u:35: prajajñayasta enaṃ yājayeyureṣā ha tvetasya yajñasya samṛddhiryadenaṃ vidvāṃso
GV03sb_05_u:38: sa vā eṣa brāhmaṇasyaiva yajñaḥ | yadenena bṛhaspatirayajata brahma hi
GV03sb_05_u:39: bṛhaspatirbrahma hi brāhmaṇo 'tho rājanyasya yadenenendro 'yajata kṣatraṃ
GV03sb_05_u:42: rājña eva rājasūyam | rājā vai rājasūyeneṣṭvā bhavati na vai brāhmaṇo
GV03sb_05_u:45: rājā vai rājasūyeneṣṭvā bhavati | samrāṅvājapeyenāvaraṃ hi rājyam paraṃ sāmrājyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:46: kāmayeta vai rājā samrāḍ bhavitumavaraṃ hi rājyam paraṃ sāmrājyaṃ na
GV03sb_05_u:47: samrāṭkāmayeta rājā bhavitumavaraṃ hi rājyam paraṃ sāmrājyam
GV03sb_05_u:49: sa yo vājapeyeneṣṭvā samrāḍ bhavati | sa idaṃ sarvaṃ saṃvṛṅkte sa
GV03sb_05_u:50: karmaṇaḥ-karmaṇaḥ purastādetāṃ sāvitrīmāhutiṃ juhoti deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam
GV03sb_05_u:53: tadyathaivādo bṛhaspatiḥ | savitāram prasavāyopādhāvatsavitā vai devānām
GV03sb_05_u:54: prasavitedam me prasuva tvatprasūta idamujjayānīti tadasmai savitā prasavitā
GV03sb_05_u:56: savitā vai devānām prasavitedam me prasuva tvatprasūta idamujjayānīti tadasmai
GV03sb_05_u:59: tasmādāha | deva savitaḥ prasuva yajñam prasuva yajñapatim bhagāya divyo
GV03sb_05_u:60: gandharvaḥ ketapūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātu vācaspatirvājaṃ naḥ svadatu svāheti
GV03sb_05_u:61: prajāpatirvai vācaspatirannaṃ vājaḥ prajāpatirna idamadyānnaṃ svadatvityevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:62: sa etāmevāhutiṃ juhotyā śvaḥsutyāyā etaddhyasyaitatkarmārabdham bhavati prasanna
GV03sb_05_u:70: atha ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti | tadyadevaitenendra udajayattadevaiṣa etenojjayati
GV03sb_05_u:73: manaḥsadamupayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmyeṣa te yonirindrāya tvā
GV03sb_05_u:74: juṣṭatamamiti sādayatyeṣāṃ vai lokānāmayameva dhruva iyam pṛthivīmamevaitena
GV03sb_05_u:77: apsuṣadam tvā ghṛtasadaṃ vyomasadamupayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:78: gṛhṇāmyeṣa te yonirindrāya tvā juṣṭatamamiti sādayatyeṣāṃ vai lokānāmayameva
GV03sb_05_u:82: 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmyeṣa te yonirindrāya tvā juṣṭatamamiti sādayatyeṣa vai
GV03sb_05_u:85: apāṃ rasamudvayasaṃ sūrye santaṃ samāhitamapāṃ rasasya yo rasastaṃ vo
GV03sb_05_u:86: gṛhṇāmyuttamamupayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmyeṣa te yonirindrāya
GV03sb_05_u:87: tvā juṣṭatamamiti sādayatyeṣa vā apāṃ raso yo 'yam pavate sa eṣa sūrye samāhitaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:90: grahā ūrjāhutayaḥ | vyanto viprāya matiṃ teṣāṃ viśipriyāṇāṃ vo 'hamiṣamūrjaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:91: samagrabhamupayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭameṣa te yonirindrāya tvā
GV03sb_05_u:94: tānvā etān | pañca vājapeyagrahāngṛhṇāti prajāpatiṃ vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena
GV03sb_05_u:95: yajate saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatiḥ pañca vā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya tatprajāpatimujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:98: atha saptadaśa somagrahāngṛhṇāti | saptadaśa surāgrahānprajāpatervā ete andhasī
GV03sb_05_u:99: yatsomaśca surā ca tataḥ satyaṃ śrīrjyotiḥ somo 'nṛtam pāpmā tamaḥ suraite
GV03sb_05_u:100: evaitadubhe andhasī ujjayati sarvaṃ vā eṣa idamujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate
GV03sb_05_u:103: sa yatsaptadaśa | somagrahāngṛhṇāti saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiryajñaḥ sa
GV03sb_05_u:104: yāvāneva yajño yāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivāsyaitatsatyaṃ śriyaṃ jyotirujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:106: atha yatsaptadaśa | surāgrahāngṛhṇāti saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatiryajñaḥ sa
GV03sb_05_u:107: yāvāneva yajño yāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivāsyaitadanṛtam pāpmānaṃ tama ujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:109: ta ubhaye catustriṃśadgrahāḥ sampadyante | trayastriṃśadvai devāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:112: atha yatra rājānaṃ krīṇāti | taddakṣiṇataḥ prativeśataḥ keśavātpuruṣātsīsena
GV03sb_05_u:113: parisrutaṃ krīṇāti na vā eṣa strī na pumānyatkeśavaḥ puruṣo yadaha pumāṃstena na
GV03sb_05_u:114: strī yadu keśavastena na pumānnaitadayo na hiraṇyaṃ yatsīsaṃ naiṣa somo na surā
GV03sb_05_u:117: atha pūrvedyuḥ | dvau kharau kurvanti puro 'kṣamevānyam paścādakṣamanyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:118: netsomagrahāṃśca surāgrahāṃśca saha sādayāmeti tasmātpūrvedyurdvau kharau
GV03sb_05_u:121: atha yatra pūrvayā dvārā | vasatīvarīḥ prapādayanti tadaparayā dvārā neṣṭā
GV03sb_05_u:127: na pratyañcamakṣamadhvaryuḥ | somagrahamatiharati na prāñcamakṣaṃ neṣṭā
GV03sb_05_u:131: surāgrahaṃ sampṛcau sthaḥ sam mā bhadreṇa pṛṅktamiti netpāpamiti bravāveti tau
GV03sb_05_u:132: punarviharato vipṛcau stho vi mā pāpmanā pṛṅktamiti tadyatheṣīkām
GV03sb_05_u:136: athādhvaryuḥ | hiraṇyapātreṇa madhugrahaṃ gṛhṇāti tam madhye somagrahāṇāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:138: camaseṣu vyavanīya juhvati tānbhakṣayantyatha mādhyandine savane
GV03sb_05_u:143: ukthyānyukthānyevaitenojjayatyaindraṃ ṣoḍaśina ālabhata indro vai ṣoḍaśī
GV03sb_05_u:146: sārasvataṃ saptadaśāya stotrāyālabhate | tadetadanatirātre sati rātre rūpaṃ kriyate
GV03sb_05_u:147: prajāpatiṃ vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate saṃvatsaro vai prajāpatistadetena
GV03sb_05_u:148: sārasvatena rātrimujjayati tasmādetadanatirātre sati rātre rūpaṃ kriyate
GV03sb_05_u:150: atha marudbhya ujjeṣebhyaḥ | vaśām pṛśnimālabhata iyaṃ vai vaśā
GV03sb_05_u:151: pṛśniryadidamasyām mūli cāmūlaṃ cānnādyam pratiṣṭitaṃ teneyaṃ vaśā pṛśnirannaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:152: vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate 'nnapeyaṃ ha vai nāmaitadyadvājapeyaṃ viśo vai
GV03sb_05_u:153: maruto 'nnaṃ vai viśa ujjeṣebhya ityujjityā eva durvede ujjeṣavatyau yājyānuvākye
GV03sb_05_u:154: yadyujjeṣavatyau na vindedapi ye eva ke ca mārutyau syātāṃ durvedo eva vaśā
GV03sb_05_u:155: pṛśniryadi vaśām pṛśni na vindedapi yaiva kā ca vaśā syāt
GV03sb_05_u:157: tasyā āvṛt | yatra hotā māhendraṃ grahamanuśaṃsati tadasyai vapayā pracareyureṣa
GV03sb_05_u:158: vā indrasya niṣkevalyo graho yanmāhendro 'pyasyaitanniṣkevalyameva stotraṃ
GV03sb_05_u:159: niṣkevalyaṃ śastramindro vai yajamānastanmadhyata evaitadyajamāne vīryaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:165: tathaiṣā kṛtsnām bhavatyatha yadetaiḥ pracarati tena daivīṃ viśamujjayatyathārdhāni
GV03sb_05_u:166: mānuṣyai viśa upaharati teno mānuṣīṃ viśamujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:168: tadu tathā na kuryāt | hvalati vā eṣa yo yajñapathādetyeti vā eṣa yajñapathādya evaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:169: karoti tasmādyatraivaitareṣām paśūnāṃ vapābhiḥ pracaranti tadevaitasyai vapayā
GV03sb_05_u:170: pracareyurekadhāvadānāni śrapayanti na mānuṣyai viśa upaharanti
GV03sb_05_u:172: atha saptadaśa prājāpatyānpaśūnālabhate | te vai sarve tūparā bhavanti sarve śyāmāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:173: sarve muṣkarāḥ prajāpatiṃ vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate 'nnaṃ vai prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:174: paśurvā annaṃ tatprajāpatimujjayati somo vai prajāpatiḥ paśurvai pratyakṣaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:175: somastatpratyakṣam prajāpatimujjayati saptadaśa bhavanti saptadaśo vai
GV03sb_05_u:178: te vai sarve tūparā bhavanti | puruṣo vai prajāpaternediṣṭhaṃ so 'yaṃ tūparo
GV03sb_05_u:179: 'viṣāṇastūparo vā aviṣāṇaḥ prajāpatiḥ prājāpatyā ete tasmātsarve tūparā bhavanti
GV03sb_05_u:181: sarve śyāmāḥ | dve vai śyāmasya rūpe śuklaṃ caiva loma kṛṣṇaṃ ca dvandvaṃ vai
GV03sb_05_u:182: mithunam prajananam prajananam prajāpatiḥ prājāpatyā ete tasmātsarve śyāmā
GV03sb_05_u:185: sarve muṣkarāḥ | prajananaṃ vai muṣkaraḥ prajananam prajāpatiḥ prājāpatyā ete
GV03sb_05_u:186: tasmātsarve muṣkarā bhavanti durvedā evaṃsamṛddhāḥ paśavo
GV03sb_05_u:187: yadyevaṃsamṛddhānna vindedapi katipayā evaivaṃsamṛddhāḥ syuḥ sarvamu
GV03sb_05_u:190: taddhaike | vāca uttamamālabhante yadi vai prajāpateḥ paramasti vāgeva
GV03sb_05_u:191: tadetadvācamujjayāma iti vadantastadu tathā na kuryātsarvaṃ vā idam
GV03sb_05_u:192: prajāpatiryadime lokā yadidaṃ kiṃ ca sā yadevaiṣu lokeṣu vāgvadati
GV03sb_05_u:195: teṣāmāvṛt | yatra maitrāvaruṇo vāmadevyamanuśaṃsati tadeṣāṃ vapābhiḥ pracareyuḥ
GV03sb_05_u:196: prajananaṃ vai vāmadevyam prajananam prajāpatiḥ prājāpatyā ete tasmādeṣāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:199: atheṣṭā anuyājā bhavanti | avyūḍhe srucāvathaiṣāṃ havirbhiḥ pracaranti so 'nto 'nto
GV03sb_05_u:201: yamadhvānameṣyantsyāttaṃ gatvā sa kva tataḥ syādevaṃ tattasmādeṣāmatra
GV03sb_05_u:204: tadu tathā na kuryāt | hvalati vā eṣa yo yajñapathādetyeti vā eṣa yajñapathādya evaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:205: karoti tasmādyatraivetareṣām paśūnāṃ vapābhiḥ pracaranti tadevaiteṣāṃ vapābhiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:206: pracareyuryavetareṣām paśūnāṃ havirbhiḥ pracaranti tadevaiteṣāṃ haviṣā
GV03sb_05_u:207: pracareyurekānuvākyā ekā yājyaikadevatyā hi prajāpataya ityupāṃśūktvā cāgānāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:208: haviṣo 'nubrūhīti prajāpataya ityupāṃśūktvā cāgānāṃ haviḥ prasthitam preṣyeti
GV03sb_05_u:211: taṃ vai mādhyandine savane 'bhiṣiñcati | mādhyandine savana ājiṃ dhāvantyeṣa vai
GV03sb_05_u:212: prajāpatirya eṣa yajñastāyate yasmādimāḥ prajāḥ prajātā etamvevāpyetarhyanu
GV03sb_05_u:215: agṛhīte māhendre | eṣa vā indrasya niṣkevalyo graho yanmāhendro
GV03sb_05_u:219: atha rathamupāvaharati | indrasya vajro 'sīti vajro vai ratha indro vai
GV03sb_05_u:220: yajamānastasmādāhendrasya vajro 'sīti vājasā iti vājasā hi rathastvayāyaṃ vājaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:223: taṃ dhūrgṛhītamantarvedyabhyavavartayati | vājasya nu prasave mātaram
GV03sb_05_u:224: mahīmityannaṃ vai vājo 'nnasya nu prasave mātaram mahīmityevaitadāhāditiṃ nāma
GV03sb_05_u:225: vacasā karāmahā itīyaṃ vai pṛthivyaditistasmādāhāditiṃ nāma vacasā karāmaha iti
GV03sb_05_u:226: yasyāmidaṃ viśvam bhuvanamāviveśetyasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvam bhuvanamāviṣṭaṃ tasyāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:227: no devaḥ savitā dharma sāviṣaditi tasyāṃ no devaḥ savitā yajamānaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:231: ha vā agre 'śvaḥ sambabhūva so 'dbhyaḥ sambhavannasarvaḥ samabhavadasarvo hi vai
GV03sb_05_u:232: samabhavattasmānna sarvaiḥ padbhiḥ pratitiṣṭhatyekaikameva pādamudacya tiṣṭhati
GV03sb_05_u:237: vājina ityanenāpi devīrāpo yo va ūrmiḥ pratūrtiḥ kakunmānvājasāstenāyaṃ vājaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:240: atha rathaṃ yunakti | sa dakṣiṇāyugyamevāgre yunakti savyāyugyaṃ vā agre mānuṣe
GV03sb_05_u:243: sa yunakti | vāto vā mano veti na vai vātātkim canāśīyo 'sti na manasaḥ kiṃ canāśīyo
GV03sb_05_u:244: 'sti tasmādāha vāto vā mano veti gandharvāḥ saptaviṃśatiste 'gre 'śvamayuñjanniti
GV03sb_05_u:245: gandharvā ha vā agre 'śvaṃ yuyujustadye 'gre 'śvamayuñjaṃste tvā
GV03sb_05_u:249: atha savyāyugyaṃ yunakti | vātaraṃhā bhavavājinyujyamāna iti vātajavo bhava
GV03sb_05_u:250: vājinyujyamāna ityevaitadāhendrasyeva dakṣiṇaḥ śriyaidhīti yathendrasya dakṣiṇaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:251: śriyaivaṃ yajamānasya śriyaidhītyevaitadāha yuñjantu tvā maruto viśvavedasa iti
GV03sb_05_u:252: yuñjantu tvā devā ityevaitadāha te tvaṣṭā patsu javaṃ dadhātviti nātra
GV03sb_05_u:253: tirohitamivāstyatha dakṣiṇāpraṣṭiṃ yunakti savyāpraṣṭiṃ vā agre mānuṣe 'thaivaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:256: sa yunakti | javo yaste vājinnihito guhā yaḥ śyene parītto acaracca vāta iti javo yaste
GV03sb_05_u:257: bājinnapyanyatrāṣanihitastena na imaṃ yajñam prajāpatimujjayetyevaitadāha tena no
GV03sb_05_u:258: vājinbalavānbalena vājajicca bhava samane ca pārayiṣṇurityannaṃ vai vājo 'nnajicca
GV03sb_05_u:259: na edhyasmiṃśca no yajñe devasamana imaṃ yajñam prajāpatimujjayetyevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:261: te vā eta eva trayo yuktā bhavanti | trivṛddhi devānāṃ taddhi devatrādhipraṣṭiyuga
GV03sb_05_u:262: eva caturtho 'nveti mānuṣā hi sa taṃ yatra dāsyanbhavati taccaturthamupayujya
GV03sb_05_u:263: dadāti tasmādapītarasminyajña eta eva trayo yuktā bhavanti trivṛddhi devānāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:264: taddhi devatrādhipraṣṭiyuga eva caturtho 'nveti mānuṣo hi sa taṃ yatra
GV03sb_05_u:267: atha bhārhaspatyaṃ carum naivāraṃ saptadaśaśarāvaṃ nirvapati annaṃ vā eṣa ujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:268: yo vājapeyena yajate 'nnapeyaṃ ha vai nāmaitadyadvājapeyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:274: atha yannaivāro bhavati | brahma vai bṛhaspatirete vai brahmaṇā pacyante
GV03sb_05_u:275: yannīvārāstasmānnaivāro bhavati saptadaśaśarāvo bhavati saptadaśo vai
GV03sb_05_u:278: tamaśvānavaghrāpayati | vājina iti vājino hyaśvāstasmādāha vājina iti vājajita
GV03sb_05_u:279: ityannaṃ vai vājo 'nnajita ityevaitadāha vājaṃ sariṣyanta ityājiṃ hi sariṣyanto
GV03sb_05_u:280: bhavanti bṛhaspaterbhāgamavajighrateti bṛhaspaterhyeṣa bhāgo bhavati tasmādāha
GV03sb_05_u:283: yadbrahmā rathacakre sāma gāyati nābhidaghna uddhite
GV03sb_05_u:287: sa brahmā rathacakramadhirohati | nābhidaghna uddhitaṃ devasyāhaṃ savituḥ save
GV03sb_05_u:288: satyasavaso bṛhaspateruttamaṃ nākaṃ ruheyamiti yadi brāhmaṇo yajate brahma hi
GV03sb_05_u:291: atha yadi rājanyo yajate | devasyāhaṃ savituḥ save satyasavasa indrasyottamaṃ nākaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:294: triḥ sāmābhigāyati | trirabhigīyāvarohati devasyāhaṃ savituḥ save satyaprasavaso
GV03sb_05_u:295: bṛhaspateruttamaṃ nākamaruhamiti yadi brāhmaṇo yajate brahma hi
GV03sb_05_u:298: atha yadi rājanyo yajate | devasyāhaṃ savituḥ save satyaprasavasa indrasyottamaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:301: atha saptadaśa dundubhīnanuvedyantaṃ samminvanti | pratīca āgnīdhrātprajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_05_u:302: vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate vāgvai prajāpatireṣā vai paramā vāgyā
GV03sb_05_u:306: athaiteṣāṃ dundubhīnām | ekaṃ yajuṣāhanti tatsarve yajuṣāhatā bhavanti
GV03sb_05_u:308: sa āhanti | bṛhaspate vājaṃ jaya bṛhaspataye vācaṃ vadata bṛhaspatiṃ vājaṃ jāpayateti
GV03sb_05_u:309: yadi brāhmaṇo yajate brahma hi bṛhaspatirbrahma hi brāhmaṇaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:311: atha yadi rājanyo yajate | indra vājaṃ jayendrāya vācaṃ vadatendraṃ vājaṃ jāpayateti
GV03sb_05_u:317: sa upāvaharati | eṣā vaḥ sā satyā saṃvāgabhūdyayā bṛhaspatiṃ vājamajījapatājījapata
GV03sb_05_u:318: bṛhaspatiṃ vājaṃ vanaspatayo vimucyadhvamiti yadi brāhmaṇo yajate brahma hi
GV03sb_05_u:321: atha yadi rājanyo yajate | eṣā vaḥ sā satyā saṃvāgabhūdyayendraṃ
GV03sb_05_u:322: vājamajījapatājījapatendraṃ vājaṃ vanaspatayo vimucyadhvamiti kṣatraṃ hīndraḥ
GV03sb_05_u:325: atha vedyantāt | rājanya udaṅ saptadaśa pravyādhānpravidhyati yāvānvā ekaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:329: tadyadrājanyaḥ pravidhyati | eṣa vai prajāpateḥ pratyakṣatamāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:334: atha yaṃ yajuṣā yunakti | taṃ yajamāna ātiṣṭhati devasyāhaṃ savituḥ save
GV03sb_05_u:337: tadyathaivādo bṛhaspatiḥ | savitāram prasavāyopādhāvatsavitā vai devānām
GV03sb_05_u:338: prasavitedam me prasuva tvatprasūta idamujjayānīti tadasmai savitā prasavitā
GV03sb_05_u:340: savitā vai devānām prasavitedam me prasuva tvatprasūta idamujjayānīti tadasmai
GV03sb_05_u:343: atha yadyadhvaryoḥ | antevāsī vā brahmacārī vaitadyajuradhīyātso 'nvāsthāya
GV03sb_05_u:344: vācayati vājina iti vājino hyaśvāstasmādāha vājina iti vājajita ityannaṃ vai vājo
GV03sb_05_u:345: 'nnajita ityevaitadāhādhvana skabhnuvanta ityadhvano hi skabhnuvanto dhāvanti
GV03sb_05_u:346: yojanā mimānā iti yojanaśo hi mimānā adhvānaṃ dhāvanti kāṣṭhāṃ gacateti
GV03sb_05_u:347: yathainānantarā nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi na hiṃsyurevametadāha dhāvantyājimāghnanti
GV03sb_05_u:350: athaitābhyāṃ jagatībhyām | juhoti vānu vā mantrayate yadi juhoti
GV03sb_05_u:353: sa juhoti | eṣa sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyām baddho apikakṣa āsani kratuṃ
GV03sb_05_u:356: uta sma | asya dravatasturaṇyataḥ parṇaṃ na veranuvāti pragardhinaḥ śyenasyeva
GV03sb_05_u:357: dhrajato aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ sahorjā taritrataḥ svāheti
GV03sb_05_u:359: athottareṇa tricena | juhoti vānu vā mantrayate dvayaṃ tadyasmājjuhoti vānu vā
GV03sb_05_u:360: mantrayate yadi juhoti yadyanumantrayate samāna eva
GV03sb_05_u:361: bandhuretānevaitadaśvāndhāvata upavājayatyeteṣu vīryaṃ dadhāti tisro vā imāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:362: pṛthivya iyamahaikā dve asyāḥ pare tā evaitadujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:364: so 'numantrayate | śaṃ no bhavantu vājino haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ svarkāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:367: te no arvantaḥ | havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājino mitadravaḥ sahasrasā
GV03sb_05_u:368: meghasātā saniṣyavo maho ye dhanaṃ samitheṣu jabhrire
GV03sb_05_u:370: vāje-vāje 'vata | vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ asya madhvaḥ pibata
GV03sb_05_u:373: atha bārhaspatyena caruṇā pratyupatiṣṭhate | tamupaspṛśatyannaṃ vā eṣa ujjayati yo
GV03sb_05_u:377: sa upaspṛśati | ā mā vājasya prasavo jagamyādityannaṃ vai vāja ā mānnasya prasavo
GV03sb_05_u:378: jagamyādityevaitadāheme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe iti dyāvāpṛthivī hi prajāpatirā mā
GV03sb_05_u:379: gantām pitarāmātarā ceti māteva ca hi piteva ca prajāpatirā mā somo amṛtatvena
GV03sb_05_u:382: tamaśvānavaghrāpayati | vājina iti vājino hyaśvāstasmādāha vājina iti vājajita
GV03sb_05_u:383: ityannaṃ vai vājo 'nnajita ityevaitadāha vājaṃ savṛvāṃsaṃ iti sariṣyanta iti vā agra āha
GV03sb_05_u:384: sariṣyanta iva hi tarhi bhavantyathātra sasṛvāṃsa iti savṛvāṃsa iva hyatra bhavanti
GV03sb_05_u:385: tasmādāha sasṛvāṃsa iti bṛhaspaterbhāgamavajighrateti bṛhaspaterhyeṣa bhāgo
GV03sb_05_u:386: bhavati tasmādāha bṛhaspaterbhāgamavajighrateti nimṛjānā iti tadyajamāne vīryaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:390: athaiteṣāmājiśritāṃ rathānām | ekasminvaiśyo vā rājanyo vopāsthito bhavati sa
GV03sb_05_u:391: vederuttarāyāṃ śroṇā upaviśatyathādhvaryuśca yajamānaśca pūrvayā dvārā
GV03sb_05_u:392: madhugrahamādāya niṣkrāmatastaṃ vaiśyasya vā rājanyasya vā prāṇāvādhatto 'tha
GV03sb_05_u:393: neṣṭāparayā dvārā surāgrahānādāya niṣkrāmati sa jaghanena śālām paryetyaikaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:394: vaiśyasya vā rājanyasya vā prāṇāvādadhadāhānena ta imaṃ niṣkrīṇāmīti satyaṃ vai
GV03sb_05_u:395: śrīrjyotiḥ somo 'nṛtam pāpmā tamaḥ surā satyamevaitacriyaṃ jyotiryajamāne
GV03sb_05_u:396: dadhātyanṛtena pāpmanā tamasā vaiśyaṃ vidhyati taiḥ sa yam bhogaṃ kāmayate taṃ
GV03sb_05_u:397: kurute 'thaitaṃ sahiraṇyapātrameva madhugraham brahmaṇe dadāti tam brahmaṇe
GV03sb_05_u:398: dadadamṛtamāyur ātmandhatte 'mṛtaṃ hyāyurhiraṇyaṃ tena sa yam bhogaṃ kāmayate
GV03sb_05_u:401: atha sruvaṃ cājyavilāpanīṃ cādāya | āhavanīyamabhyaiti sa etā dvādaśāptīrjuhoti vā
GV03sb_05_u:402: vācayati vā yadi juhoti yadi vācayati samāna eva bandhuḥ
GV03sb_05_u:404: sa juhoti | āpaye svāhā svāpaye svāhāpijāyaṃ svāhā kratave svāhā vasave
GV03sb_05_u:405: svāhāharpataye svāhāhne mugdhāya svāhā mugdhāya vainaṃśināya svāhā vinaṃśina
GV03sb_05_u:406: āntyāyanāya svāhāntyāya bhauvanāya svāhā bhuvanasya pataye svāhādhipataye
GV03sb_05_u:407: svāhetyetā dvādaśāptīrjuhoti dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:410: atha ṣaṭ kL!ptīḥ | juhoti vā vācayati vā yadi juhoti yadi vācayati samāna eva
GV03sb_05_u:413: sa vācayati | āyuryajñena kalpatām prāṇo yajñena kalpatāṃ cakṣuryajñena kalpatāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:414: śrotraṃ yajñena kalpatām pṛṣṭhaṃ yajñena kalpatāṃ yajño yajñena kalpatāmityetāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:415: ṣaṭkL!ptīrvācayati ṣaḍvā ṛtavaḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:418: aṣṭāśriryūpo bhavati | aṣṭākṣarā vai gāyatrī gāyatramagneścando
GV03sb_05_u:419: devalokamevaitenojjayati saptadaśabhirvāsobhiryūpo veṣṭito vā vigrathito vā bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:422: gaudhūmaṃ caṣālam bhavati | puruṣo vai prajāpaternediṣṭhaṃ so 'yamatvagete vai
GV03sb_05_u:426: gartanvānyūpo 'tīkṣṇāgro bhavati | pitṛdevatyo vai gartaḥ pitṛlokamevai
GV03sb_05_u:429: atha neṣṭā patnīmudāneṣyan | kauśaṃ vāsaḥ paridhāpayati kauśaṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:430: caṇḍātakamantaraṃ dīkṣitavasanājjaghanārdho vā eṣa yajñasya yatpatnī
GV03sb_05_u:431: tāmetatprācīṃ yajñam prasādayiṣyanbhavatyasti vai patnyā amedhyaṃ yadavācīnaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:432: nābhermedhyā vai darbhāstadyadevāsyā amedhyaṃ tadevāsyā etaddarbhairmedhyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:433: kṛtvāthainām prācīṃ yajñam prasādayati tasmānneṣṭā patnīmudānesyankauśaṃ vāsaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:436: atha niśrayaṇo niśrayati | sa dakṣiṇata udaṅ roheduttarato vā dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:439: sa rokṣyanjāyāmāmantrayate | jāya ehi svo rohāveti rohāvetyāha jāyā
GV03sb_05_u:440: tadyajjāyāmāmantrayate 'rdho ha vā eṣa ātmano yajjāyā tasmādyāvajjāyāṃ na vindate
GV03sb_05_u:441: naiva tāvatprajāyate 'sarvo hi tāvadbhavatyatha yadaiva jāyāṃ vindate 'tha prajāyate
GV03sb_05_u:442: tarhi hi sarvo bhavati sarva etāṃ gatiṃ gacānīti tasmājjāyāmāmantrayate
GV03sb_05_u:444: sa rohati | prajāpateḥ prajā abhūmeti prajāpaterhyeṣa prajā bhavati yo vājapeyena
GV03sb_05_u:447: atha godhūmānupaspṛśati | svardevā aganmeti svarhyeṣa gacati yo vājapeyena yajate
GV03sb_05_u:449: tadyadgodhūmānupaspṛśati | annaṃ vai godhūmā annaṃ vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena
GV03sb_05_u:454: atha śīrṣṇā yūpamatyujjihīte | amṛtā abhūmeti devalokamevaitenojjayati
GV03sb_05_u:456: atha diśo 'nuvīkṣamāṇo japati | asme vo astvindriyamasme nṛmṇamuta kraturasme
GV03sb_05_u:457: varcāṃsi santu va iti sarvaṃ vā eṣa idamujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate prajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_05_u:458: hyujjayati sarvamu hyevedam prajāpatiḥ so 'sya sarvasya yaśa indriyaṃ vīryaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:461: athainamūṣapuṭairanūdasyanti | paśavo vā ūṣā annaṃ vai paśavo 'nnaṃ vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:462: ujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate 'nnapeyaṃ ha vai nāmaitadyadvājapeyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:466: āśvattheṣu palāśeṣūpanaddhā bhavanti | sa yadevādo 'śvatthe tiṣṭhata indro maruta
GV03sb_05_u:467: upāmantrayata tasmādāśvattheṣu palāśeṣūpanaddhā bhavanti viśo 'nūdasyanti viśo
GV03sb_05_u:468: vai maruto 'nnaṃ viśastasmādviśo 'nūdasyanti saptadaśa bhavanti saptadaśo vai
GV03sb_05_u:471: athemāmupāvekṣamāṇo japati | namo mātre pṛthivyai namo mātre pṛthivyā iti
GV03sb_05_u:472: bṛhaspaterha vā abhiṣiṣicānātpṛthivī bibhayāṃ cakāra mahadvā ayamabhūdyo
GV03sb_05_u:473: 'bhyaṣeci yadvai māyaṃ nāvadṛṇīyāditi bṛhaspatirha pṛthivyai bibhayāṃ cakāra yadvai
GV03sb_05_u:474: meyaṃ nāvadhūnvīteti tadanayaivaitanmitradheyamakuruta na hi mātā putraṃ hinasti
GV03sb_05_u:477: bṛhaspatisavo vā eṣa yadvājapeyam | pṛthivyu haitasmādbibheti mahadvā
GV03sb_05_u:478: ayamabhūdyo 'bhyaṣeci yadvai māyaṃ nāvadṛṇīyādityeṣa u hāsyai bibheti yadvai
GV03sb_05_u:479: meyaṃ nāvadhūnvīteti tadanayaivaitanmitradheyaṃ kurute na hi mātā putraṃ hinasti
GV03sb_05_u:482: atha hiraṇyamabhyavarohati | amṛtamāyurhiraṇyaṃ tadamṛta āyuṣi pratitiṣṭhati
GV03sb_05_u:487: athāsmā āsandīmāharanti | uparisadyaṃ vā eṣa jayati yo jayatyantarikṣasadyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:490: audumbarī bhavati | annaṃ vā ūrgudumbara ūrjo 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyai
GV03sb_05_u:491: tasmādaudumbarī bhavati tāmagreṇa havirdhāne jaghanenāhavanīyaṃ nidadhāti
GV03sb_05_u:493: athājarṣabhasyājinamāstṛṇāti | prajāpatirvā eṣa yadajarṣabha etā vai prajāpateḥ
GV03sb_05_u:494: pratyakṣatamāṃ yadajāstasmādetāstriḥ saṃvatsarasya vijāyamānā dvau trīniti
GV03sb_05_u:497: sa āstṛṇāti | iyaṃ te rāḍiti rājyamevāsminnetaddadhātyathainamāsādayati yantāsi
GV03sb_05_u:498: yamana iti yantāramevainametadyamanamāsām prajānāṃ karoti dhruvo 'si dharuṇa
GV03sb_05_u:499: iti dhruvamevainametaddharuṇamasmiṃloke karoti kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya tvā rayyai
GV03sb_05_u:502: bārhaspatyena caruṇā pracarati | tasyāniṣṭa eva sviṣṭakṛdbhavatyathāsmā annaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:503: sambharatyannaṃ vā eṣa ujjayati yo vājapeyena yajate 'nnapeyaṃ ha vai
GV03sb_05_u:506: audumbare pātre | annaṃ vā ūrgudumbara ūrjo 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyai
GV03sb_05_u:507: tasmādaudumbare pātre so 'pa eva prathamāḥ sambharatyatha payo 'tha
GV03sb_05_u:510: taddhaike | saptadaśānnāni sambharanti saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiriti vadantastadu tathā
GV03sb_05_u:511: na kuryātprajāpaternveva sarvamannamanavaruddhaṃ ka u tasmai manuṣyo yaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:515: sa yanna sambharati | tasyodbruvīta tasya nāśnīyādyāvajjīvaṃ tathā nāntameti tathā
GV03sb_05_u:516: jyogjīvati sa etasya sarvasyānnādyasya sambhṛtasya sruveṇopaghātaṃ vājaprasavīyāni
GV03sb_05_u:517: juhoti tadyābhya evaitaddevatābhyo juhoti tā asmai prasuvanti tābhiḥ prasūta ujjayati
GV03sb_05_u:520: sa juhoti | vājasyemam prasavaḥ suṣuve 'gre somaṃ rājānamoṣadhīṣvapsu tā
GV03sb_05_u:521: asmabhyam madhumatīrbhavantu vayaṃ rāṣṭre jāgṛyāma purohitāḥ svāhā
GV03sb_05_u:523: vājasyemām | prasavaḥ śiśriye divamimā ca viśvā bhuvanāni samrāṭ aditsantaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:524: dāpayati prajānantsa no rayiṃ sarvavīraṃ niyacatu svāhā
GV03sb_05_u:526: vājasya nu | prasava ābabhūvemā ca viśvā bhuvanāni sarvataḥ sanemi rājā pariyāti
GV03sb_05_u:529: somaṃ rājānam avase 'gnimanvārabhāmahe | ādityānviṣṇuṃ sūryam brahmāṇaṃ ca
GV03sb_05_u:532: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim | indraṃ dānāya codāya vācaṃ viṣṇuṃ sarasvatīṃ savitāraṃ ca
GV03sb_05_u:535: agne acā | vadeha naḥ prati naḥ sumanā bhava pra no yaca sahasrajittvaṃ hi dhanadā
GV03sb_05_u:538: pra naḥ | yacatvaryamā pra pūṣā pra bṛhaspatiḥ pra vāgdevī dadātu naḥ svāheti
GV03sb_05_u:544: so 'bhiṣiñcati | devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo hastābhyāmiti
GV03sb_05_u:545: devahastairevainametadabhiṣiñcati sarasvatyai vāco yanturyantriye dadhāmīti vāgvai
GV03sb_05_u:546: sarasvatī tadenaṃ vāca eva yanturyantriye dadhāti
GV03sb_05_u:548: tadu haika āhuḥ | viśveṣāṃ tvā devānāṃ yanturyantriye dadhāmīti sarvaṃ vai viśve
GV03sb_05_u:549: devāstadenaṃ sarvasyaiva yanturyantriye dadhāti tadu tathā na brūyātsarasvatyai tvā
GV03sb_05_u:550: vāco yanturyantriye dadhāmītyeva brūyādvāgvai sarasvatī tadenaṃ vāca eva
GV03sb_05_u:551: yanturyantriye dadhāti bṛhaspateṣṭvā sāmrājyenābhiṣiñcāmyasāviti nāma gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_05_u:558: athojjitīḥ | juhoti vā vācayati vā yadi juhoti yadi vācayati samāna eva bandhuḥ
GV03sb_05_u:562: devatā udajayaṃstadevaiṣa etābhirujjayati saptadaśa bhavanti saptadaśo vai
GV03sb_05_u:565: athāhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte 'nubrūhīti | tadyadantareṇāhutī etatkarma kriyata eṣa vai
GV03sb_05_u:566: prajāpatirya eṣa yajñastāyate yasmādimāḥ prajāḥ prajātā etamvevāpyetarhyanu
GV03sb_05_u:568: kriyata āśrāvyāhāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajeti vaṣaṭkṛte juhoti
GV03sb_05_u:570: atheḍāmādadhāti | upahūtāyāmiḍāyāmapa upaspṛśya māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_05_u:571: māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā stotramupākaroti taṃ stotrāya pramīvati sa upāvarohati so
GV03sb_05_u:574: taddhaike | etatkṛtvāthaitatkurvanti tadu tathā na kuryādātmā vai stotram prajā
GV03sb_05_u:575: śastrametasmāddha sa yajamānam praṇāśayati sa jihma eti sa hvalati tasmādetadeva
GV03sb_05_u:578: atheḍāmādadhāti | upahūtāyāmiḍāyāmapa upaspṛśya māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_05_u:579: māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā stotramupākaroti taṃ stotrāya pramīvati sa upāvarohati so
GV03sb_05_u:582: pūrṇāhutiṃ juhoti | sarvaṃ vai pūrṇaṃ sarvam parigṛhya sūyā iti tasyāṃ varaṃ dadāti
GV03sb_05_u:583: sarvaṃ vai varaḥ sarvam parigṛhya sūyā iti sa yadi kāmayeta juhuyādetāṃ yadyu
GV03sb_05_u:586: atha śvo bhūte | anumatyai haviraṣṭākapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati sa ye jaghanena
GV03sb_05_u:587: śamyām piṣyamāṇānāmavaśīyante piṣṭāni vā taṇḍulā vā tāntsruve sārdhaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:588: saṃvapatyanvāhāryapacanādulmukamādadate tena dakṣiṇā yanti sa yatra svakṛtaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:591: tadagniṃ samādhāya juhoti | eṣa te nirṛte bhāgastaṃ juṣasvasvāhetīyaṃ vai nirṛtiḥ sā
GV03sb_05_u:592: yam pāpmanā gṛhṇāti taṃ nirṛtyā gṛhṇāti tadyadevāsyā atra nairṛtaṃ rūpaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:593: tadevaitacamayati tatho hainaṃ sūyamānaṃ nirṛtirna gṛhṇātyatha yatsvakṛte veriṇe
GV03sb_05_u:596: athāpratīkṣam punarāyanti | athānumatyā aṣṭākapālena puroḍāśena pracaratīyaṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:597: anumatiḥ sa yastatkarma śaknoti kartuṃ yaccikīrṣatīyaṃ hāsmai tadanumanyate
GV03sb_05_u:600: atha yadaṣṭākapālo bhavati | aṣṭākṣarā vai gāyatrī gāyatrī vā iyam pṛthivyatha
GV03sb_05_u:601: yatsamānasya haviṣa ubhayatra juhotyeṣā hyevaitadubhayaṃ tasya vāso dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:602: yadvai savāsā araṇyaṃ nodāśaṃsate nidhāya vai tadvāso 'timucyate tatho hainaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:605: atha śvo bhūte | āgnāvaiṣṇavamekādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati tena
GV03sb_05_u:607: havistadevaitadagnirvai sarvā devatā agnau hi sarvābhyo devatābhyo juhvatyagnirvai
GV03sb_05_u:608: yajñasyāvarārdhyo viṣṇuḥ parārdhyastatsarvāścaivaitaddevatāḥ parigṛhya sarvaṃ ca
GV03sb_05_u:609: yajñam parigṛhya sūyā iti tasmādāgnāvaiṣṇava ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:610: tasya hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇāgneyo vā eṣa yajño bhavatyagne reto hiraṇyaṃ yo vai viṣṇuḥ
GV03sb_05_u:611: sa yajño 'gniru vai yajña eva tadu tadāgneyameva tasmāddhiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:613: atha śvo bhūte | agnīṣomīyamekādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati tena
GV03sb_05_u:614: yatheṣṭyaivaṃ yajata etena vā indro vṛtramahanneteno eva vyajayata yāsyeyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:615: vijitistāṃ tatho evaiṣa etena pāpmānaṃ dviṣantam bhrātṛvyaṃ hanti tatho eva
GV03sb_05_u:616: vijayate vijite 'bhaye 'nāṣṭre sūyā iti tasmādagnīṣomīya ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo
GV03sb_05_u:617: bhavati tasyotsṛṣṭo gaurdakṣiṇotsarjaṃ vā amuṃ candramasaṃ ghnanti
GV03sb_05_u:620: atha śvo bhūte | aindrāgnaṃ dvādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati tena
GV03sb_05_u:621: yatheṣṭyaivaṃ yajate yatra vā indro vṛtramahaṃstadasya bhītasyendriyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:622: vīryamapacakrāma sa etena haviṣendriyaṃ vīryam punarātmannadhatta tatho
GV03sb_05_u:623: evaiṣa etena haviṣendriyaṃ vīryamātmandhatte tejo vā agnirindriyaṃ vīryamindra
GV03sb_05_u:624: ubhe vīrye parigṛhya sūyā iti tasmādaindrāgno dvādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:628: athāgrayaṇeṣṭyā yajate | sarvānvā eṣa yajñakratūnavarunddhe sarvā iṣṭīrapi
GV03sb_05_u:629: darvihomānyo rājasūyena yajate devasṛṣṭo vā eṣeṣṭiryadāgrayaṇeṣṭiranayā me
GV03sb_05_u:630: pīṣṭamasadanayāpi sūyā iti tasmādāgrayaṇeṣṭyā yajata oṣadhīrvā eṣa sūyamāno 'bhi
GV03sb_05_u:631: sūyate tadoṣadhīrevaitadanamīvā akilviṣāḥ kurute 'namīvā akilviṣā oṣadhīrabhi
GV03sb_05_u:634: atha cāturmāsyairyajate | sarvānvā eṣa yajñakratūnavarunddhe sarvā iṣṭīrapi
GV03sb_05_u:635: darvihomānyo rājasūyena yajate devasṛṣṭo vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:639: vaiśvadevena yajate | vaiśvadevena vai prajāpatirbhūmānam prajāḥ sasṛje bhūmānam
GV03sb_05_u:640: prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā sūyā iti tatho evaiṣa etadvaiśvadevenaiva bhūmānam prajāḥ sṛjate
GV03sb_05_u:644: varuṇapāśātprāmuñcattā asyānamīvā akilviṣāḥ prajā prājāyantānamīvā akilviṣāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:645: prajā abhi sūyā iti tatho evaiṣa etadvaruṇapraghāsaireva prajā varuṇapāśātpramuñcati
GV03sb_05_u:646: tā asyānamīvā akilviṣāḥ prajāḥ prajāyante 'namīva akilviṣāḥ prajā abhi sūyā iti
GV03sb_05_u:648: atha sākamedhairyajate | sākamedhairvai devā vṛtramaghnaṃstairveva vyajayanta
GV03sb_05_u:649: yeyameṣāṃ vijitistāṃ tatho evaiṣa etaiḥ pāpmānaṃ dviṣantam bhrātṛvyaṃ hanti tatho
GV03sb_05_u:652: atha śunāsīryeṇa yajate | ubhau rasau parigṛhya sūyā ityatha pañcavītīyaṃ sa
GV03sb_05_u:655: sa pūrvārdhye juhoti | agninetrebhyo devebhyaḥ puraḥsadbhyaḥ svāhetyatha
GV03sb_05_u:656: dakṣiṇārdhye juhoti yamanetrebhyo devebhyo dakṣiṇāsadbhyaḥ svāhetyatha
GV03sb_05_u:658: svāhetyathottarārdhye juhoti mitrāvaruṇanetrebhyo vā marunnetrebhyo vā devebhyo
GV03sb_05_u:659: uttarāsadbhyaḥ svāhetyatha madhye juhoti somanetrebhyo devebhya uparisadbhyo
GV03sb_05_u:662: atha sārdhaṃ samuhya juhoti | ye devā agninetrāḥ puraḥsadastebhyaḥ svāhā ye devā
GV03sb_05_u:663: yamanetrā dakṣiṇāsadastebhyaḥ svāhā ye devā viśvadevanetrāḥ paścātsadastebhyaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:664: svāhā ye devā mitrāvaruṇanetrā vā marunnetrā vottarāsadastebhyaḥ svāhā ye devāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:665: somanetrā uparisado duvasvantastebhyaḥ svāheti tadyadevaṃ juhoti
GV03sb_05_u:667: yatra vai devāḥ | sākamedhairvyajayanta yeyameṣāṃ vijitistāṃ taddhocurutpibante vā
GV03sb_05_u:668: imāni dikṣu nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hantaibhyo vajram praharāmeti vajro vā ājyaṃ ta etena
GV03sb_05_u:669: vajreṇājyena dikṣu nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyavāghnaṃste vyajayanta yeyameṣāṃ vijitistāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:670: tatho evaiṣa etena vajreṇājyena dikṣu nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyavahanti tatho eva vijayate
GV03sb_05_u:673: atha yadetā aparāḥ pañcāhutīrjuhoti | kṣaṇvanti vā etadagnervivṛhanti
GV03sb_05_u:674: yatpañcadhāhavanīyaṃ vyūhanti tadevāsyaitena saṃdadhāti tasmādetā aparāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:677: tasya praṣṭivāhano 'śvaratho dakṣiṇā | trayo 'śvā dvau savyaṣṭhṛsārathī te pañca
GV03sb_05_u:678: prāṇā yo vai prāṇaḥ sa vātastadyadetasya karmaṇa eṣā dakṣiṇā tasmātpañcavātīyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:681: sa haitenāpi bhiṣajyet | ayaṃ vai prāṇo yo 'yam pavate yo vai prāṇaḥ sa āyuḥ so
GV03sb_05_u:682: 'yameka ivaiva pavate so 'yam puruṣe 'ntaḥ praviṣṭo daśadhā vihito daśa vā etā
GV03sb_05_u:683: āhutīrjuhoti tadasmindaśa prāṇānkṛtsnameva sarvamāyurdadhāti sa yadihāpi
GV03sb_05_u:686: athendraturīyam | āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati vāruṇo yavamayaścarū
GV03sb_05_u:687: raudro gāvedhukaścaruranaḍuhyai vahalāyā aindraṃ dadhi tenendraturīyeṇa yajata
GV03sb_05_u:688: indrāgnī u haivaitatsamūdāte utpibante vā imāni dikṣu nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hantaibhyo
GV03sb_05_u:691: sa hāgniruvāca | trayo mama bhāgāḥ santvekastaveti tatheti tāvetena haviṣā dikṣu
GV03sb_05_u:692: nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyavāhatāṃ tau vyajayetāṃ yainayoriyaṃ vijitistāṃ tatho evaiṣa etena
GV03sb_05_u:693: haviṣā dikṣu nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyavahanti tatho eva vijayate vijite 'bhaye nāṣṭre sūyā
GV03sb_05_u:696: sa ya eṣa āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati | so 'gnereko bhāgo 'tha yadvāruṇo
GV03sb_05_u:697: yavamayaścarurbhavati yo vai varuṇaḥ so 'gniḥ so 'gnerdvitīyo bhāgo 'tha yadraudro
GV03sb_05_u:698: gāvedhukaścarurbhavati yo vai rudraḥ so 'gniḥ so 'gnestṛtīyo bhāgo 'tha
GV03sb_05_u:699: yadgāvedhuko bhavati vāstavyo vā eṣa devo vāstavyā gavedhukāstasmādgāvedhuko
GV03sb_05_u:700: bhavatyatha yadanaḍuhyai vahalāyā aindraṃ dadhi bhavati sa indrasya caturtho
GV03sb_05_u:701: bhāgo yadvai caturthaṃ tatturīyaṃ tasmādindraturīyaṃ nāma tasyaiṣaivānaḍuhī
GV03sb_05_u:702: vahalā dakṣiṇā sā hi vahenāgneyyagnidagdhamiva hyasyai vaham bhavatyatha yatstrī
GV03sb_05_u:703: satī vahatyadharmeṇa tadasyai vāruṇaṃ rūpamatha yadgaustena raudryatha yadasyā
GV03sb_05_u:704: aindraṃ dadhi tenaindryeṣā hi vā etatsarvaṃ vyaśnute tasmādeṣaivānaḍuhī vahalā
GV03sb_05_u:707: athāpāmārgahomaṃ juhoti | apāmārgairvai devā dikṣu nāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyapāmṛjata te
GV03sb_05_u:708: vyajayanta yeyameṣāṃ vijitistāṃ tatho evaiṣa etadapāmārgaireva dikṣu nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_05_u:709: rakṣāṃsyapamṛṣṭe tatho eva vijayate vijite 'bhaye 'nāṣṭre sūyā iti
GV03sb_05_u:711: sa pālāśe vā sruve vaikaṅkate vā | apāmārgataṇḍulānādatte
GV03sb_05_u:712: 'nvāhāryapacanādulmukamādadate tena prāñco vodañco vā yanti tadagniṃ samādhāya
GV03sb_05_u:715: sa ulmukamādatte | agne sahasva pṛtanā iti yudho vai pṛtanā yudhaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:718: rakṣobhirnāṣṭrābhistarannarātīriti sarvaṃ hyeṣa pāpmānaṃ tarati tasmādāha
GV03sb_05_u:719: tarannarātīriti varco dhā yajñavāhasīti sādhu yajamānaṃ dadhadityevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:721: tadagniṃ samādhāya juhoti | devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo
GV03sb_05_u:723: upāṃśuryajñamukhenaivaitannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hanti hataṃ rakṣaḥ svāheti tannāṣṭrā
GV03sb_05_u:726: sa yadi pālāśaḥ sruvo bhavati | brahma vai palāśo brahmaṇaivaitannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_05_u:727: hanti yadyu vaikaṅkato vajro va vikaṅkato vajreṇaivaitannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hanti
GV03sb_05_u:728: rakṣasāṃ tvā badhāyeti tannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hanti
GV03sb_05_u:730: sa yadi prāṅitvā juhoti | prāñcaṃ sruvamasyati yadyudaṅṅitvā juhotyudañcaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:731: sruvamasyatyabadhiṣma rakṣa iti tannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsi hanti
GV03sb_05_u:733: athāpratīkṣam punarāyanti | sa haitenāpi pratisaraṃ kurvīta sa yasyāṃ tato diśi
GV03sb_05_u:734: bhavati tatpratītya juhoti pratīcīnaphalo vā apāmārgaḥ sa yo hāsmai tatra
GV03sb_05_u:735: kiṃcitkaroti tameva tatpratyagdhūrvati tasya nāmādiśedabadhiṣmāmumasau hata iti
GV03sb_05_u:739: vaiṣṇavaṃ trikapālaṃ vā puroḍāśaṃ caruṃ vā tena triṣaṃyuktena yajate
GV03sb_05_u:742: sa yadāgnāvaiṣṇavaḥ | ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavatyagnirvai dātā vaiṣṇavāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:745: atha yadaindrāvaiṣṇavaḥ | carurbhavatīndro vai yajamāno vaiṣṇavāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:748: atha yadvaiṣṇavaḥ | trikapālo vā puroḍāśo bhavati carurvā yānevāsmā agnirdātā
GV03sb_05_u:749: puruṣāndadāti teṣvevaitadantataḥ pratitiṣṭhati yadvai puruṣavānkarma cikīrṣati
GV03sb_05_u:750: śaknoti vai tatkartuṃ tatpuruṣānevaitadupaiti puruṣavāntsūyā iti tasya vāmano
GV03sb_05_u:753: athāpareṇa triṣaṃyuktena yajate | sa āgnāpauṣṇamekādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:754: nirvapatyaindrāpauṣṇaṃ carum pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ tena triṣaṃyuktena yajate paśūneva
GV03sb_05_u:757: sa yadāgnāpauṣṇaḥ | ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavatyagnirvai dātā pauṣṇāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:760: atha yadaindrāpauṣṇaḥ | carurbhavatīndro vai yajamānaḥ pauṣṇāḥ paśavaḥ sa
GV03sb_05_u:763: atha yatpauṣṇaḥ | carurbhavati yānevāsmā agnirdātā paśūndadāti teṣvevaitadantataḥ
GV03sb_05_u:764: pratitiṣṭhati yadvai paśumānkarma cikīrṣati śaknoti vai tatkartuṃ
GV03sb_05_u:765: tatpaśūnevaitadupaiti paśumāntsūyā iti tasya śyāmo gaurdakṣiṇā sa hi pauṣṇo
GV03sb_05_u:766: yacyāmo dve vai śyāmasya rūpe śuklaṃ caiva loma kṛṣṇaṃ ca dvandvaṃ vai
GV03sb_05_u:767: mithunam prajananaṃ vai pūṣā paśavo hi pūṣā paśavo hi prajananam
GV03sb_05_u:771: nirvapatyaindrāsaumyaṃ caruṃ saumyaṃ caruṃ tena triṣaṃyuktena yajate varca eva
GV03sb_05_u:774: sa yadagnīṣomīyaḥ | ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavatyagnirvai dātā varcaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:777: atha yadaindrāsaumyaḥ | carurbhavatīndro vai yajamāno varcaḥ somaḥ sa yadevāsmā
GV03sb_05_u:780: atha yatsaumyaḥ | carurbhavati yadevāsmā agnirdātā varco dadāti
GV03sb_05_u:781: tasminnevaitadantataḥ pratitiṣṭhati yadvai varcasvī karma cikīrṣati śaknoti vai
GV03sb_05_u:782: tatkartuṃ tadvarca evaitadupaiti varcasvī sūyā iti no hyavarcaso vyāptyā canārtho 'sti
GV03sb_05_u:783: tasya babhrurgaurdakṣiṇā sa hi saumyo yadbabhruḥ
GV03sb_05_u:785: atha śvo bhūte | vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati vāruṇa yavamayaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:786: caruṃ tābhyāmanūcīnāhaṃ veṣṭibhyāṃ yajate samānabarhirbhyāṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:788: sa yadvaiśvānaro bhavati | saṃvatsaro vai vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:789: prajāpatireva tadbhūmānam prajāḥ sasṛje bhūmānam prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā sūyā iti tatho
GV03sb_05_u:790: evaiṣa etadbhūmānam prajāḥ sṛjate bhūmānam prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā sūyā iti
GV03sb_05_u:792: atha yaddvādaśakapālo bhavati | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_05_u:797: akilviṣāḥ prajāḥ prajāyante 'namīvā akilviṣāḥ prajā abhi sūyā iti
GV03sb_05_u:799: ṛṣabho vaiśvānarasya dakṣiṇā | saṃvatsaro vai vaiśvānaraḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_05_u:800: prajāpatirṛṣabho vai paśūnām prajāpatistasmādṛṣabho vaiśvānarasya dakṣiṇā kṛṣṇaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:801: vāso vāruṇasya taddhi vāruṇaṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ yadi kṛṣṇaṃ na vindedapi yadeva kiṃ ca
GV03sb_05_u:802: vāsaḥ syādgranthibhirhi vāso vāruṇaṃ varuṇyo hi granthiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:805: puroḍāśaṃ nirvapatyagnirvai devatānāmanīkaṃ senāyā vai senānīranīkaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:806: tasmādagnaye 'nīkavata etadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yatsenānīstasmā evaitena sūyate taṃ
GV03sb_05_u:807: svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasya hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇāgneyo vā eṣa yajño bhavatyagne
GV03sb_05_u:810: atha śvo bhūte | purohitasya gṛhānparetya bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapati bṛhaspatirvai
GV03sb_05_u:811: devānāṃ purohita eṣa vā etasya purohito bhavati tasmādbārhaspatyo bhavatyetadvā
GV03sb_05_u:812: asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yatpurohitastasmā evaitena sūyate taṃ svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute
GV03sb_05_u:813: tasya śitipṛṣṭho gaurdakṣiṇaiṣā vā ūrdhvā bṛhaspaterdiktadeṣa upariṣṭādaryamṇaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:816: atha śvo bhūte | sūyamānasya gṛha aindramekādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
GV03sb_05_u:817: kṣatraṃ vā indraḥ kṣatraṃ sūyamānastasmādaindro bhavati tasyarṣabho dakṣiṇā sa
GV03sb_05_u:820: atha śvo bhūte | mahiṣyai gṛhānparetya ādityaṃ caruṃ nirvapatīyaṃ vai pṛthivyaditiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:821: seyaṃ devānām patnyeṣā vā etasya patnī bhavati tasmādādityo bhavatyetadvā
GV03sb_05_u:822: asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yanmahiṣī tasyā evaitena sūyate tāṃ svāmanapakramiṇīṃ kurute
GV03sb_05_u:823: tasyai dhenurdakṣiṇā dhenuriva vā iyam manuṣyebhyaḥ sarvānkāmānduhe mātā
GV03sb_05_u:826: atha śvo bhūte | sūtasya gṛhānparetya vāruṇaṃ yavamayaṃ caruṃ nirvapati savo vai
GV03sb_05_u:827: sūtaḥ savo vai devānāṃ varuṇastasmādvāruṇo bhavatyetadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:828: yatsūtastasmā evaitena sūyate taṃ svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasyāśvo dakṣiṇā sa hi
GV03sb_05_u:831: atha śvo bhūte | grāmaṇyo gṛhānparetya mārutaṃ saptakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
GV03sb_05_u:832: viśo vai maruto vaiśyo vai grāmaṇīstasmānmāruto bhavatyetadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:833: yadgrāmaṇīstasmā evaitena sūyate taṃ svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasya
GV03sb_05_u:834: pṛṣangaurdakṣiṇā bhūmā vā etadrūpāṇāṃ yatpṛṣato gorviśo vai maruto bhūmo vai
GV03sb_05_u:837: atha śvo bhūte | kṣatturgṛhānparetya sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ vāṣṭākapālaṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:838: puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati savitā vai devānām prasavitā prasavitā vai kṣattā tasmātsāvitro
GV03sb_05_u:839: bhavatyetadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yatkṣattā tasmā evaitena sūyate taṃ
GV03sb_05_u:840: svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasya śyeto 'naḍvāndakṣiṇaiṣa vai savitā ya eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:841: tapatyeti vā eṣa etyanaḍvānyuktastadyacyeto bhavati śyeta iva hyeṣa udyaṃścāstaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:844: atha śvo bhūte | saṃgrahīturgṛhānparetyāśvinaṃ dvikapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
GV03sb_05_u:845: sayonī vā aśvinau sayonī savyaṣṭhṛsārathī samānaṃ hi
GV03sb_05_u:846: rathamadhitiṣṭhatastasmādāśvino bhavatyetadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yatsaṃgrahītā tasmā
GV03sb_05_u:847: evaitena sūyate taṃ svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasya yamau gāvau dakṣiṇā tau hi
GV03sb_05_u:848: sayonī yadyamau yadi yamau na vindedapyanūcīnagarbhāveva gāvau dakṣiṇā syātāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:851: atha śvo bhūte | bhāgadughasya gṛhānparetya pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapati pūṣā vai
GV03sb_05_u:852: devānām bhāgadugha eṣa vā etasya bhāgadugho bhavati tasmātpauṣṇo
GV03sb_05_u:853: bhavatyetadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yadbhāgadughastasmā evaitena sūyate taṃ
GV03sb_05_u:854: svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasya śyāmo gaurdakṣiṇā tasyāsāveva bandhuryo 'sau
GV03sb_05_u:857: atha śvo bhūte | akṣāvāpasya ca gṛhebhyo govikartasya ca gavedhukāḥ sambhṛtya
GV03sb_05_u:858: sūyamānasya gṛhe raudraṃ gāvedhukh!ṃ caruṃ nirvapati te vā ete dve satī ratne ekaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:859: karoti sampadaḥ kāmāya tadyadetena yajate yāṃ vā imāṃ sabhāyāṃ ghnanti rudro
GV03sb_05_u:861: yadakṣāstamevaitena prīṇāti tasya ha vā eṣānumatā gṛheṣu hanyate yo vā rājasūyena
GV03sb_05_u:862: yajate yo vaitadevaṃ vedaitadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yadakṣāvāpaśca govikartaśca
GV03sb_05_u:863: tābhyāmevaitena sūyate tau svāvanapakramiṇau kurute tasya dvirūpo gaurdakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:864: śitibāhurvā śitivālo vāsirnakharo vāladāmnākṣāvapanam prabaddhametadu hi
GV03sb_05_u:867: atha śvo bhūte | pālāgalasya gṛhānparetya caturgṛhītamājyaṃ gṛhītvādhvana ājyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:868: juhoti juṣāṇo 'dhvājyasya vetu svāheti praheyo vai pālāgalo 'dhvānaṃ vai prahita eti
GV03sb_05_u:869: tasmādadhvana ājyaṃ juhotyetadvā asyaikaṃ ratnaṃ yatpālāgalastasmā evaitena sūyate
GV03sb_05_u:870: taṃ svamanapakramiṇaṃ kurute tasya dakṣiṇā pyukṣṇaveṣṭitaṃ dhanuścarmamayā
GV03sb_05_u:871: vāṇavanto lohita uṣṇīṣa etadu hi tasya bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:873: tāni vā etāni | ekādaśa ratnāni sampādayatyekādaśākṣarā vai triṣṭubvīryaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:875: vai rājā bhavati tebhya evaitena sūyate tāntsvānanapakramiṇaḥ kurute
GV03sb_05_u:877: atha śvo bhūte | parivṛtyai gṛhānparetya nairṛtaṃ caruṃ nirvapati yā vā aputrā patnī
GV03sb_05_u:878: sā parivṛttī sa kṛṣṇānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ nakhairnirbhidya taṇḍulānnairṛtaṃ caruṃ śrapayati
GV03sb_05_u:879: sa juhotyeṣa te nirṛte bhāgastaṃ juṣasva svāheti yā vā aputrā patnī sā nirṛtigṛhītā
GV03sb_05_u:880: tadyadevāsya atra nairṛtaṃ rūpaṃ tadevaitacamayati tatho hainaṃ sūyamānaṃ nirṛtirna
GV03sb_05_u:881: gṛhṇāti tasya dakṣiṇā kṛṣṇā gauḥ parimūrṇī paryāriṇī sā hyapi nirṛtigṛhītā tāmāha
GV03sb_05_u:885: upariṣṭādratnānāṃ saumāraudreṇa yajate | sa śvetāyai śvetavatsāyai payasi śṛto
GV03sb_05_u:888: svarbhānurha vā āsuraḥ | sūryaṃ tamasā vivyādha sa tamasā viddho na vyarocata tasya
GV03sb_05_u:889: somārudrāvevaitattamo 'pāhatāṃ sa eṣo 'pahatapāpmā tapati tatho evaiṣa etattamaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:890: praviśatyetaṃ vā tamaḥ praviśati yadayajñiyānyajñena prasajatyayajñiyānvā
GV03sb_05_u:892: 'pahatapāpmaiva dīkṣate tadyacvetāyai śvetavatsāyai payasi śṛto bhavati kṛṣṇaṃ vai
GV03sb_05_u:895: sa haitenāpi yajeta | yo 'laṃ yaśase sanna yaśo bhavati yo vā anūcānaḥ so 'laṃ yaśase
GV03sb_05_u:896: sanna yaśo bhavati yo na yaśo bhavati sa tamasā vai sa tatprāvṛto bhavati tasya
GV03sb_05_u:897: somārudrāvevaitattamo 'pahataḥ so 'pahatapāpmā jyotireva śriyā yaśasā bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:899: atha maitrābārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapati | hvalati vā eṣa yo yajñapathādetyeti vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:901: śūdrāṃstvadyāṃstvanmitrābṛhaspatī vai yajñapatho brahma hi mitro brahma hi yajño
GV03sb_05_u:902: brahma hi bṛhaspatirbrahma hi yajñastatpunaryajñapathamapipadyate so 'pipadyaiva
GV03sb_05_u:905: tasyāvṛt | yā svayampraśīrṇāśvatthī śākhā prācī vodīcī vā bhavati tasyai maitram
GV03sb_05_u:906: pātraṃ karoti varuṇyā vā eṣā yā paraśuvṛkṇāthaiṣā maitrī yā svayampraśīrṇā
GV03sb_05_u:909: athātacya dadhi | vināṭa āsicya rathaṃ yuktvābadhya dedīyitavā āha
GV03sb_05_u:910: tadyatsvayamuditaṃ navanītaṃ tadājyam bhavati varuṇyaṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:914: dvedhā taṇḍulānkurvanti | sa ye 'ṇīyāṃsaḥ paribhinnāste bārhaspatyā atha ye
GV03sb_05_u:915: sthavīyāṃso 'paribhinnāste maitrā na vai mitraḥ kaṃ cana hinasti na mitraṃ kaścana
GV03sb_05_u:916: hinasti nainaṃ kuśo na kaṇṭako vibhinatti nāsya vraṇaścanāsti sarvasya hyeva mitro
GV03sb_05_u:919: atha bārhaspatyaṃ carumadhiśrayati | tam maitreṇa pātreṇāpidadhāti tadājyamānayati
GV03sb_05_u:920: tattaṇḍulānāvapati sa eṣa ūṣmaṇaiva śrapyate varuṇyo vā eṣa yo 'gninā śṛto 'thaiṣa
GV03sb_05_u:921: maitro ya ūṣmaṇā śṛtastasmādūṣmaṇā śṛto bhavati tayorubhayoravadyannāha
GV03sb_05_u:924: sa vai dīkṣate | sa upavasathe 'gnīṣomīyam paśumālabhate tasya vapayā
GV03sb_05_u:925: pracaryāgnīsomīyamekādaśakapālam puroḍāśam nirvapati tadanu devasvāṃ havīṃṣi
GV03sb_05_u:928: savitre satyaprasavāya | dvādaśakapālaṃ vāṣṭākapālaṃ vā puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati
GV03sb_05_u:929: plāśukānāṃ vrīhīṇāṃ savitā vā devānām prasavitā savitṛprasūtaḥ sūyā ityatha
GV03sb_05_u:932: athāgnaye gṛhapataye | aṣṭākapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapatyāśūnāṃ śrīrvai gārhapataṃ
GV03sb_05_u:936: atha somāya vanaspataye | śyāmākaṃ carum nirvapati tadenaṃ soma eva
GV03sb_05_u:937: vanaspatiroṣadhibhyaḥ suvatyatha yacyāmāko bhavatyete vai somasyauṣadhīnāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:940: atha bṛhaspataye vāce | naivāraṃ caruṃ nirvapati tadenam bṛhaspatireva vāce
GV03sb_05_u:941: suvatyatha yannaivāro bhavati brahma vai bṛhaspatirete vai brahmaṇā pacyante
GV03sb_05_u:944: athendrāya jyeṣṭhāya | hāyanānāṃ caruṃ nirvapati tadenamindra eva jyeṣṭho
GV03sb_05_u:945: jyaiṣṭhyamabhi pariṇayatyatha yaddhāyanānām bhavatyatiṣṭhā vā etā oṣadhayo
GV03sb_05_u:948: atha rudrāya paśupataye | raudraṃ gāvedhukaṃ caruṃ nirvapati tadenaṃ rudra eva
GV03sb_05_u:949: paśupatiḥ paśubhyaḥ suvatyatha yadgāvedhuko bhavati vāstavyo vā eṣa devo vāstavyā
GV03sb_05_u:952: atha mitrāya satyāya | nāmbānāṃ caruṃ nirvapati tadenam mitra eva satyo brahmaṇe
GV03sb_05_u:953: suvatyatha yannāmbānām bhavati varuṇyā vā etā oṣadhayo yāḥ kṛṣṭe jāyante 'thaite
GV03sb_05_u:956: atha varuṇāya dharmapataye | vāruṇaṃ yavamayaṃ caruṃ nirvapati tadenaṃ varuṇa
GV03sb_05_u:957: eva dharmapatirdharmasya patiṃ karoti paramatā vai sā yo dharmasya patirasadyo hi
GV03sb_05_u:958: paramatāṃ gacati taṃ hi dharma upayanti tasmādvaruṇāya dharmapataye
GV03sb_05_u:963: athainaṃ dakṣiṇe bāhāvabhipadya japati | savitā tvā savānāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:964: suvatāmagnirgṛhapatīnāṃ somo vanaspatīnām bṛhaspatirvāca indro jyaiṣṭhyāya
GV03sb_05_u:965: rudraḥ paśubhyo mitraḥ satyo varuṇo dharmapatīnām
GV03sb_05_u:967: imaṃ devāḥ | asapatnaṃ suvadhvamitīmaṃ devā abhrātṛvyaṃ suvadhvamityevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:968: mahate kṣatrāya mahate jyaiṣṭhyāyeti nātra tirohitamivāsti mahate jānarājyāyeti
GV03sb_05_u:971: janma tata evaitadāhāsyai viśa iti yasyai viśo rājā bhavatyeṣa vo 'mī rājā somo
GV03sb_05_u:972: 'smākam brāhmaṇānāṃ rājeti tadasmā idaṃ sarvamādyaṃ karoti
GV03sb_05_u:975: etā ha vai devāḥ savasyeśate | tasmāddevasvo nāma tadenametā eva devatāḥ suvate
GV03sb_05_u:978: tā vai dvināmnyo bhavanti | dvandvaṃ vai vīryaṃ vīryavatyaḥ suvāntā iti
GV03sb_05_u:981: athāhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte 'nubrūhīti | tadyadantareṇāhutī etatkarma kriyata eṣa vai
GV03sb_05_u:982: prajāpatirya eṣa yajñastāyate yasmādimāḥ prajāḥ prajātā etamvevāpyetarhyanu
GV03sb_05_u:983: prajāyantetadenam madhyata evaitasya prajāpaterdadhāti madhyataḥ suvati
GV03sb_05_u:984: tasmādantareṇāhutī etatkarma kriyata āśrāvyāhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte preṣyeti vaṣaṭkṛte
GV03sb_05_u:987: sa vā apaḥ sambharati | tadyadapaḥ sambharati vīryaṃ vā āpo
GV03sb_05_u:990: audumbare pātre | annaṃ vā ūrgudumbara ūrjo 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyai
GV03sb_05_u:993: sa sārasvatīreva prathamā gṛhṇāti | apo devā madhumatīragṛbhṇannityapo devā
GV03sb_05_u:995: yadāhorjasvatīriti rājasvaścitānā iti yāḥ prajñātā rājasva ityevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:1001: athādhvaryuḥ | caturgṛhītamājyaṃ gṛhītvāpo 'bhyavaiti tadyā ūrmī vyardataḥ paśau
GV03sb_05_u:1004: sa yaḥ prāṅgudardati | taṃ gṛhṇāti vṛṣṇa ūrmirasi rāṣṭradā me dehi svāhā vṛṣṇa
GV03sb_05_u:1007: atha yaḥ pratyaṅṅudardati | taṃ gṛhṇāti vṛṣaseno 'si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me dehi svāhā
GV03sb_05_u:1008: vṛṣaseno 'si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai dehīti tābhirabhiṣiñcati vīryaṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:1009: etadapāmudardati paśau vā puruṣe vābhyavete vīryeṇaivainametadabhiṣiñcatyetā vā
GV03sb_05_u:1012: atha syandamānā gṛhṇāti | artheta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhārtheta stha
GV03sb_05_u:1013: rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai datteti tābhirabhiṣiñcati vīryeṇa vā etāḥ syandante
GV03sb_05_u:1014: tasmādenāḥ syandamānā na kiṃcana pratidhārayate vīryeṇaivainametadabhiṣiñcatyetā
GV03sb_05_u:1017: atha yāḥ syandamānānām pratīpaṃ syandante | tā gṛhṇātyojasvatī stha rāṣṭradā
GV03sb_05_u:1018: rāṣṭram me datta svāhaujasvatī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai datteti
GV03sb_05_u:1019: tābhirabhiṣiñcati vīryeṇa vā etāḥ syandamānānām pratīpaṃ syandante
GV03sb_05_u:1022: athāpayatīrgṛhṇāti | āpaḥ parivāhiṇī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai datteti
GV03sb_05_u:1023: tābhirabhiṣiñcatyetasyai vā eṣāpacidyaiṣaiva punarbhavatyapi ha vā
GV03sb_05_u:1025: dadhāti bhūmnaivainametadabhiṣiñcatyetā vā ekā āpastā evaitatsambharati
GV03sb_05_u:1027: atha nadīpatiṃ gṛhṇāti | apām patirasi rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me dehi svāhāpām patirasi
GV03sb_05_u:1028: rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai dehīti tābhirabhiṣiñcatyapāṃ vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1029: patiryannadīpatirviśāmevainametatpatiṃ karotyetā vā ekā āpastā evaitatsambharati
GV03sb_05_u:1031: atha niveṣyaṃ gṛhṇāti | apāṃ garbho 'si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me dehi svāhāpāṃ garbho
GV03sb_05_u:1032: 'si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai dehīti tābhirabhiṣiñcati garbhaṃ vā etadāpa
GV03sb_05_u:1033: upaniveṣṭante viśāmevainametadgarbhaṃ karotyetā vā ekā āpastā evaitatsambharati
GV03sb_05_u:1035: atha yaḥ syandamānānāṃ sthāvaro hrado bhavati | pratyātāpe tā gṛhṇāti sūryatvacasa
GV03sb_05_u:1036: stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā sūryatvacasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai
GV03sb_05_u:1038: sūryatvacasamevainametatkaroti varuṇyā vā etā āpo bhavanti yāḥ syandamānānāṃ na
GV03sb_05_u:1039: syandante varuṇasavo vā eṣa yadrājasūyaṃ tasmādetābhirabhiṣiñcatyetā vā ekā āpastā
GV03sb_05_u:1042: atha yā ātapati varṣanti | tā gṛhṇāti sūryavarcasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta
GV03sb_05_u:1043: svāhā sūryavarcasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai datteti tābhirabhiṣiñcati
GV03sb_05_u:1044: varcasaivainametadabhiṣiñcati sūryavarcasamevainametatkaroti medhyā vā etā āpo
GV03sb_05_u:1045: bhavanti yā ātapati varṣantyaprāptā hīmām bhavantyathainā gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_05_u:1048: atha vaiśantīrgṛhṇāti | māndā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā māndā stha
GV03sb_05_u:1050: etatsthāvarāmanapakramiṇīṃ karotyetā vā ekā āpastā evaitatsambharati
GV03sb_05_u:1052: atha kūpyā gṛhṇāti | vrajakṣita stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā vrajakṣita
GV03sb_05_u:1053: stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai datteti tābhirabhiṣiñcati tadyā imām pareṇāpastā
GV03sb_05_u:1054: evaitatsambharatyapāmu caiva sarvatvāya tasmādetābhirabhiścatyetā vā ekā āpastā
GV03sb_05_u:1057: atha pruṣvā gṛhṇāti | vāśā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā vāśā stha rāṣṭradā
GV03sb_05_u:1060: aṃ vā asāvāditya udyanneva yathāyamagnirnirdahedevamoṣadhīrannādyaṃ nirdahati
GV03sb_05_u:1061: tadetā āpo 'bhyavayatyaḥ śamayanti na ha vā ihānnādyaṃ pariśiṣyate yadetā āpo
GV03sb_05_u:1064: atha madhu gṛhṇāti | śaviṣṭā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā śaviṣṭhā stha
GV03sb_05_u:1066: ca rasenābhiṣiñcatyetā vā ekā āpastā evaitatsambharati
GV03sb_05_u:1068: atha gorvijāyamānāyā ulbyā gṛhṇāti | śakvaro stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā
GV03sb_05_u:1069: śakvarī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai datteti tābhirabhiṣiñcati
GV03sb_05_u:1072: atha payo gṛhṇāti | janabhṛta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā janabhṛta stha
GV03sb_05_u:1076: atha ghṛtaṃ gṛhṇāti | viśvabhṛta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram me datta svāhā viśvabhṛta
GV03sb_05_u:1080: atha marīcīḥ | añjalinā saṃgṛhyāpisṛjatyāpaḥ svarāja stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭramamuṣmai
GV03sb_05_u:1081: dattetyetā vā āpaḥ svarājo yanmarīcayastā yatsyandanta ivānyo 'nyasyā evaitacriyā
GV03sb_05_u:1082: atiṣṭhamānā uttarādharā iva bhavantyo yanti svārājyamevāsminnetaddadhātyetā vā
GV03sb_05_u:1085: tā vā etāḥ | saptadaśāpaḥ sambharati saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1088: ṣoḍaśa tā āpo yā abhijuhoti | ṣoḍaśāhutīrjuhoti tā dvātriṃśaddvayīṣu na juhoti
GV03sb_05_u:1089: sārasvatīṣu ca marīciṣu ca tāścatustriṃśattrayastriṃśadvai devāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1092: atha yaddhutvā-hutvā gṛhṇāti | vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitadājyena spṛtvā-spṛtvā
GV03sb_05_u:1095: atha yatsārasvatīṣu na juhoti | vāgvai sarasvatī vajra ājyaṃ nedvajreṇājyena vācaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1098: atha yanmarīciṣu na juhoti | nedanaddhevaitāmāhutiṃ juhavānīti tasmānmarīciṣu
GV03sb_05_u:1102: pṛcyantāmiti rasavatī rasavatībhiḥ pṛcyantāmityevaitadāha mahi kṣatraṃ kṣatriyāya
GV03sb_05_u:1103: vanvānā iti tatparo 'kṣaṃ yajamānāyāśiṣamāśāste yadāha mahi kṣatraṃ kṣatriyāya
GV03sb_05_u:1106: tā agreṇa maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyaṃ sādayati | anādhṛṣṭāḥ sīdata sahaujasa
GV03sb_05_u:1107: ityanādhṛṣṭāḥ sīdata rakṣobhirityevaitadāha sahaujasa iti savīryā ityevaitadāha mahi
GV03sb_05_u:1108: kṣatraṃ kṣatriyāya dadhatīriti tatpratyakṣaṃ kṣatraṃ yajamānāyāśiṣamāśāste
GV03sb_05_u:1111: taṃ vai mādhyadine savane 'bhiṣiñcati | eṣa vai prajāpatirya eṣa yajñastāyate
GV03sb_05_u:1112: yasmādimāḥ prajāḥ prajātā etamvevāpyetarhyanu prajāyante tadenam madhyata
GV03sb_05_u:1115: agṛhīte māhendre | eṣa vā indrasya niṣkevalyo graho yanmāhendro
GV03sb_05_u:1119: agreṇa maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyam | śārdūlacarmopastṛṇāti somasya tviṣirasīti yatra
GV03sb_05_u:1120: vai soma indramatyapavata sa yattataḥ śārdūlaḥ samabhavattena somasya
GV03sb_05_u:1121: tviṣistasmādāha somasya tviṣirasīti taveva me tviṣirbhūyāditi śārdūlatviṣi
GV03sb_05_u:1124: atha pārthāni juhoti | pṛthā ha vai vainyo manuṣyāṇām prathamo 'bhiṣiṣice so
GV03sb_05_u:1126: sarvamannādyamavarurudhe 'pi ha smāsmā āraṇyānpaśūnabhihvayantyasāvehi rājā tvā
GV03sb_05_u:1127: pakṣyata iti tathedaṃ tarvamannādyamavarurudhe sarvaṃ ha vā
GV03sb_05_u:1130: tāni vai dvādaśa bhavanti | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya tasmāddvādaśa bhavanti
GV03sb_05_u:1132: ṣaṭ purastādabhiṣekasya juhoti | ṣaḍupariṣṭāttadenam madhyata evaitasya
GV03sb_05_u:1135: sa yāni purastādabhiṣekasya juhoti | bṛhaspatisteṣāmuttamo bhavatyatha
GV03sb_05_u:1136: yānyupariṣṭādabhiṣekasya juhotīndrasteṣām prathamo bhavati brahma vai
GV03sb_05_u:1140: sa juhoti | yāni purastādabhiṣekasya juhotyagnaye svāheti tejo vā
GV03sb_05_u:1141: agnistejasaivainametadabhiṣiñcati somāya svāheti kṣatraṃ vai somaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1142: kṣatreṇaivainametadabhiṣiñcati savitre svāheti savitā vai devānām prasavitā
GV03sb_05_u:1143: savitṛprasūta evainametadabhiṣiñcati sarasvatyai svāheti vāgvai sarasvatī
GV03sb_05_u:1144: vācaivainametadabhiṣiñcati pūṣṇe svāheti paśavo vai pūṣā
GV03sb_05_u:1149: atha juhoti | yānyupariṣṭādabhiṣekasya juhotīndrāya svāheti vīrya vā indro
GV03sb_05_u:1150: vīryeṇaivainametadabhiṣiñcati ghoṣāya svāheti vīryaṃ vai ghoṣo
GV03sb_05_u:1151: vīryeṇaivainametadabhiṣiñcati ślokāya svāheti vīryaṃ vai śloko
GV03sb_05_u:1153: vīryeṇaivainametadabhiṣiñcati bhagāya svāheti vīryaṃ vai bhāgo
GV03sb_05_u:1157: agreṇa maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyam | abhiṣecanīyāni pātrāṇi bhavanti yatraitā āpo
GV03sb_05_u:1160: pālāśam bhavati | tena brāhmaṇo 'bhiṣiñcati brahma vai palāśo
GV03sb_05_u:1163: audumbaram bhavati | tena svo 'bhiṣiñcatyannaṃ vā ūrgudumbara ūrgvai svaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1164: yāvadvai puruṣasya svam bhavati naiva tāvadaśanāyati tenorkṣvaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1167: naiyagrodhapādam bhavati | tena mitryo rājanyo 'bhiṣiñcati padbhirvai nyagrodhaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1168: pratiṣṭhito mitreṇa vai rājanyaḥ pratiṣṭhitastasmānnaiyagrodhapādena mitryo
GV03sb_05_u:1171: āśvattham bhavati | tena vaiśyo 'bhiṣiñcati sa yadevādo 'śvatthe tiṣṭhata indro
GV03sb_05_u:1175: atha pavitre karoti | pavitre stho vaiṣṇavyāviti so 'sāveva bandhustayorhiraṇyam
GV03sb_05_u:1176: pravayati tābhyāmetā abhiṣecanīyā apa utpunāti tadyaddhiraṇyam
GV03sb_05_u:1179: sa utpunāti | saviturvaḥ prasava utpunāmyacidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiriti so
GV03sb_05_u:1181: rakṣobhirityevaitadāha yadāhānibhṛṣṭamasīti vāco bandhuriti yāvadvai prāṇeṣvāpo
GV03sb_05_u:1182: bhavanti tāvadvācā vadati tasmādāha vāco bandhuriti
GV03sb_05_u:1184: tapojā iti | agnirvai dhūmo jāyate dhūmādabhramabhrādvṛṣṭiragnervā etā jāyante
GV03sb_05_u:1187: somasya dātramasīti | yadā vā enametābhirabhiṣuṇvantyathāhutirbhavati tasmādāha
GV03sb_05_u:1188: somasya dātramasīti svāhā rājasva iti tadenāḥ svāhākāreṇaivotpunāti
GV03sb_05_u:1190: tā eteṣu pātreṣu vyānayati | sadhamādo dyumninīrāpa etā ityanatimāninya
GV03sb_05_u:1191: ityevaitadāha yadāha sadhamāda iti dyumninīrāpa etā iti vīryavatya
GV03sb_05_u:1192: ityevaitadāhānādhṛṣṭā apasyo vasānā ityanādhṛṣṭā stha rakṣobhirityevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:1193: yadāhānādhṛṣṭā apasyo vasānā iti pastyāsu cakre varuṇaḥ sadhasthamiti viśo vai
GV03sb_05_u:1194: pastyā vikṣu cakre varuṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāmityevaitadāhāpāṃ śiśurmātṛtamāsvantariti
GV03sb_05_u:1196: athainaṃ vāsāṃsi paridhāpayati | tattārpyamiti vāso bhavati tasmintsarvāṇi yajñarūpāṇi
GV03sb_05_u:1197: niṣyūtāni bhavanti tadenam paridhāpayati kṣatrasyolbamasīti tadyadeva
GV03sb_05_u:1200: athainam pāṇḍvam paridhāpayati | kṣatrasya jarāyvasīti tadyadeva kṣatrasya jarāyu
GV03sb_05_u:1203: athādhīvāsam pratimuñcati | kṣatrasya yonirasīti tadyaiva kṣatrasya yonistasyā
GV03sb_05_u:1206: athoṣṇīṣaṃ saṃhṛtya | purastādavagūhati kṣatrasya nābhirasīti tadyaiva kṣatrasya
GV03sb_05_u:1209: taddhaike | samantam pariveṣṭayanti nābhirvā asyaiṣā samantaṃ vā iyaṃ nābhiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1215: tadu tathā na kuryādaṅgāni vā asya janūrvāsāṃsyaṅgairhainaṃ sajanvā tanvā
GV03sb_05_u:1216: vyardhayanti varuṇyaṃ dīkṣitavasanaṃ sa eteṣāmevaikaṃ vāsasām paridadhīta
GV03sb_05_u:1217: tadenamaṅgairjanvā tanvā samardhayati varuṇyaṃ dīkṣitavasanaṃ tadenaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1220: sa yatrāvabhṛthamabhyavaiti | tadetadabhyavaharanti tatsaloma kriyate sa
GV03sb_05_u:1221: eteṣāmevaikaṃ vāsasām paridhāyodaiti tāni vaśāyai vā vapāyāṃ hutāyāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1224: atha dhanuradhitanoti | indrasya vārtraghnamasīti vārtraghnaṃ vai dhanurindro vai
GV03sb_05_u:1225: yajamāno dvayena vā eṣa indro bhavati yacca kṣatriyo yadu ca
GV03sb_05_u:1228: atha bāhū vimārṣṭi | mitrasyāsi varuṇasyāsīti bāhvorvai dhanurbāhubhyāṃ vai rājanyo
GV03sb_05_u:1229: maitrāvaruṇastasmādāha mitrasyāsi varuṇasyāsīti tadasmai prayacati tvayāyaṃ vṛtram
GV03sb_05_u:1232: athāsmai tisra iṣūḥ prayacati | sa yayā prathamayā samarpaṇena parābhinatti saikā
GV03sb_05_u:1233: seyam pṛthivī saiṣā dṛbā nāmātha yayā viddhaḥ śayitvā jīvati vā mriyate vā sā
GV03sb_05_u:1234: dvitīyā tadidamantarikṣaṃ saiṣā rujā nāmātha yayāpaiva rādhnoti sā tṛtīyā sāsau
GV03sb_05_u:1235: dyauḥ saiṣā kṣumā nāmaitā hi vai tisra iṣavastasmādasmai tisra iṣūḥ prayacati
GV03sb_05_u:1237: tāḥ prayacati | pātainam prāñcam pātainam pratyañcam pātainaṃ tiryañcaṃ digbhyaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1238: pāteti tadasmai sarvā eva diśo 'śaravyāḥ karoti tadyadasmai dhanuḥ prayacati vīryaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1239: vā etadrājanyasya yaddhanurvīryavantamabhiṣiñcānīti tasmādvā asmā āyudham
GV03sb_05_u:1242: athainamāvido vācayati | āvirmaryā ityaniruktam prajāpatirvā aniruktastadenam
GV03sb_05_u:1243: prajāpataya āvedayati so 'smai savamanumanyate tenānumataḥ sūyate
GV03sb_05_u:1245: āvitto agnirgṛhapatiriti | brahma agnistadenam brahmaṇa āvedayati tadasmai
GV03sb_05_u:1248: āvitto indro vṛddhaśravā iti | kṣatraṃ vā indrastadenaṃ kṣatrāyāvedayati tadasmai
GV03sb_05_u:1251: āvittau mitrāvaruṇau dhṛtavratāviti | prāṇodānau vai mitrāvaruṇau tadenam
GV03sb_05_u:1254: āvittaḥ pūṣā viśvavedā iti | paśavo vai pūṣā tadenam paśubhya āvedayati te 'smai
GV03sb_05_u:1260: āvittāditiruruśarmeti | iyaṃ vai pṛthivyaditistadenamasmai pṛthivyā āvedayati sāsmai
GV03sb_05_u:1261: savamanumanyate tayānumataḥ sūyate tadyābhya evainametaddevatābhya āvedayati tā
GV03sb_05_u:1264: keśavasya puruṣasya | lohāyasamāsya āvidhyatyaveṣṭā dandaśūkā iti sarvānvā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1265: mṛtyūnatimucyate sarvānbadhānyo rājasūyena yajate tasya jaraiva mṛtyurbhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1268: atha yatkeśavasya puruṣasya | na vā eṣa strī na pumānyatkeśavaḥ puruṣo yadaha
GV03sb_05_u:1269: pumāstena na strī yadu keśavasteno na pumānnaitadayo na hiraṇyaṃ yallohāyasaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1270: naite krimayo nākrimayo yaddandaśūkā atha yallohāyasam bhavati lohitā iva hi
GV03sb_05_u:1273: athainaṃ diśaḥ samārohayati | prācīmāroha gāyatrī tvāvatu rathantaraṃ sāma
GV03sb_05_u:1276: dakṣiṇāmāroha | triṣṭuptvāvatu bṛhatsāma pañcadaśa stomo grīṣma ṛtuḥ kṣatraṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1279: pratīcīmāroha | jagatī tvāvatu vairūpaṃ sāma saptadaśa stomo varṣā ṛturviḍ
GV03sb_05_u:1282: udīcīmāroha | anuṣṭuptvāvatu vairājaṃ sāmaikaviṃśa stomaḥ śaradṛtuḥ phalaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1285: ūrdhvāmāroha | paṅktistvāvatu śākvararaivate sāmanī triṇavatrayastriṃśau stomau
GV03sb_05_u:1292: śārdūlacarmaṇo jaghanārdhe | sīsaṃ nihitam bhavati tatpadā pratyasyati pratyastaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1293: namuceḥ śira iti namucirha vai nāmāsura āsa tamindro nivivyādha tasya padā śiro
GV03sb_05_u:1294: 'bhitaṣṭhau sa yadabhiṣṭhita udabādhata sa ucvaṅkastasya padā śiraḥ praciceda tato
GV03sb_05_u:1295: rakṣaḥ samabhavattaddha smainamanubhāṣate kva gamiṣyasi kva me mokṣyasa iti
GV03sb_05_u:1297: tatsīsenāpajaghāna | tasmātsīsam mṛdu sṛtajavaṃ hi sarveṇa hi vīryeṇāpajaghāna
GV03sb_05_u:1298: tasmāddhiraṇyarūpaṃ sanna kiyaccanārhati sṛtajavaṃ hi sarveṇa hi vīryeṇāpajaghāna
GV03sb_05_u:1299: tadvai sa tannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyapajaghāna tatho evaiṣa etannāṣṭrā rakṣāṃsyato
GV03sb_05_u:1302: athainaṃ śārdūlacarmārohayati | somasya tviṣirasīti yatra vai soma indramatyapavata
GV03sb_05_u:1303: sa yattataḥ śārdūlaḥ samabhavattena somasya tviṣistasmādāha somasya tviṣirasīti
GV03sb_05_u:1304: taveva me tviṣirbhūyāditi śārdūlatviṣimevāsminnetaddadhāti tasmādāha taveva me
GV03sb_05_u:1307: atha rukmamadhastādupāsyati | mṛtyoḥ pāhītyamṛtamāyurhiraṇyaṃ tadamṛta āyuṣi
GV03sb_05_u:1310: atha rukmaḥ śatavitṛṇo vā bhavati | navavitṛṇo vā sa yadi śatavitṛṇaḥ śatāyurvā ayam
GV03sb_05_u:1311: puruṣaḥ śatatejāḥ śatavīryastasmācatavitṛṇo yadyu navavitṛṇo naveme puruṣe
GV03sb_05_u:1318: atha bāhū udgṛhṇāti | hiraṇyarūpā uṣaso viroka ubhāvindro udithaḥ sūryaśca ārohataṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1319: varuṇa mitra gartaṃ tataścakṣāthāmaditiṃ ditiṃ ceti bāhū vai mitrāvaruṇau
GV03sb_05_u:1320: gartastasmādāhārohataṃ varuṇa mitra gartamiti tataścakṣāthāmaditiṃ ditiṃ ceti tataḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1326: tadyadenamūrdhvabāhumabhiṣiñcati | vīryaṃ vā etadrājanyasya yadbāhū vīryaṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:1327: etadapāṃ rasaḥ sambhṛto bhavati yenainametadabhiṣiñcati nenma idaṃ vīryaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1335: kṣatrapatiredhīti rājñāmadhirāja edhītyevaitadāhāti didyūnpāhītīṣavo vai didyava
GV03sb_05_u:1338: imaṃ devāḥ | asapatnaṃ suvadhvamitīmaṃ devā abhrātṛvyaṃ suvadhvamityevaitadāha
GV03sb_05_u:1339: mahate kṣatrāya mahate jyaiṣṭhyāyeti nātra tirohitamivāsti mahate jānarājyāyeti
GV03sb_05_u:1342: janma tata evaitadāhāsyai viśa iti yasyai viśo rājā bhavatyeṣa vo 'mī rājā somo
GV03sb_05_u:1343: 'smākam brāhman\ānāṃ rājeti tadasmā idaṃ sarvamādya karoti
GV03sb_05_u:1346: athaitamabhiṣekam | kṛṣṇaviṣāṇayānuvimṛṣṭe vīryaṃ vā etadapāṃ rasaḥ sambhṛto
GV03sb_05_u:1350: so 'nuvimṛṣṭe | pra parvatasya vṛṣabhasya pṛṣṭhāditi yathāyam parvato 'tiṣṭhāvā
GV03sb_05_u:1351: yatharṣabhaḥ paśūnatiṣṭhāvaivaṃ vā eṣa idaṃ sarvamatitiṣṭhatyarvāgevāsmādidaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1352: sarvam bhavati yo rājasūyena yajate tasmādāha pra parvatasya vṛṣabhasya
GV03sb_05_u:1353: pṛṣṭhānnāvaścaranti svasica iyānāḥ tā āvavṛtrannadharāgudaktā ahim budhnyamanu
GV03sb_05_u:1357: viṣṇorvikrāntamasi viṣṇoḥ krāntamasītīme vai lokā viṣṇorvikramaṇaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1361: atha brāhmaṇasya pātre | saṃsravāntsamavanayati tadbrāhmaṇaṃ rājānamanu yaśaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1364: tadyo 'sya putraḥ priyatamo bhavati | tasmā etatpātram prayacatīdam me 'yaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1367: atha pratiparetya gārhapatyamanvārabdhe juhoti | prajāpate na tvadetānyanyo viśvā
GV03sb_05_u:1368: rūpāṇi pari tā babhūva yatkāmāste juhumastanno astvayamamuṣya piteti tadyaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1369: putrastam pitaraṃ karoti yaḥ pitā tam putraṃ tadenayorvīrye vyatiṣajatyasāvasya
GV03sb_05_u:1370: piteti tadyaḥ pitā tam pitaraṃ karoti yaḥ putrastam putraṃ tadenayorvīrye vyatiṣajya
GV03sb_05_u:1371: punareva yathāyathaṃ karoti vayaṃ syāma patayo rayīṇāṃ svāhetyāśīrevaiṣaitasya
GV03sb_05_u:1374: atha ya eṣa saṃsravo 'tirikto bhavati tamāgnīdhrīye juhotyatirikto vā eṣa saṃsravo
GV03sb_05_u:1375: bhavatyatirikta āgnīdhrīyo gārhapatye havīṃṣi śrapayantyāhavanīye juhvatyathaiṣo
GV03sb_05_u:1377: diktasmāduttarārdhe juhoti sa juhoti rudra yatte krivi paraṃ nāma
GV03sb_05_u:1380: tadyo 'sya svo bhavati | tasya śataṃ vā paraḥśatā vā gā uttareṇāhavanīyaṃ sthāpayati
GV03sb_05_u:1383: varuṇāddha vā abhiṣiṣicānāt | indriyaṃ vīryamapacakrāma śaśvadya eṣo 'pāṃ rasaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1384: sambhṛto bhavati yenainametadabhiṣiñcati so 'syendriyaṃ vīryaṃ nirjaghāna
GV03sb_05_u:1387: vīryamapakrāmati varuṇasavo vā eṣa yadrājasūyamiti varuṇo karoditi tvevaiṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1390: atha rathamupāvaharati | yadvai rājanyātparāgbhavati rathena vai tadanuyuṅkte
GV03sb_05_u:1393: sa upāvaharati | indrasya vajro 'sīti vajro vai ratha indro vai yajamāno dvayena vā
GV03sb_05_u:1394: eṣa indro bhavati yacca kṣatriyo yadu ca yajamānastasmādāhendrasya vajro 'sīti
GV03sb_05_u:1397: yunajmīti bāhū vai mitrāvaruṇau bāhubhyāṃ vai rājanyo maitrāvaruṇastasmādāha
GV03sb_05_u:1400: taṃ caturyujaṃ yunakti | sa jaghanena sado 'greṇa śālāṃ yenaiva dakṣiṇā yanti tena
GV03sb_05_u:1403: tamātiṣṭhati | avyathāyai tvā svadhāyai tvetyanārtyai tvetyevaitadāha yadāhāvyathāyai
GV03sb_05_u:1404: tveti svadhāyai tveti rasāya tvetyevaitadāhāriṣṭho arjuna ityarjuno ha vai nāmendro
GV03sb_05_u:1405: yadasya gahyaṃ nāma dvayena vā eṣa indro bhavati yacca kṣatriyo yadu ca
GV03sb_05_u:1408: atha dakṣiṇāyugyamupārṣati | marutām prasavena jayeti viśo vai maruto viśā vai
GV03sb_05_u:1409: tatkṣatriyo jayati yajjigīṣati tasmādāha marutām prasavena jayeti
GV03sb_05_u:1411: atha madhye gavāmudyacati | āpāma manaseti manasā vā idaṃ sarvamāptaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1414: atha dhanurārtnyā gāmupaspṛśati | samindriyeṇetīndriyaṃ vai vīryaṃ gāva
GV03sb_05_u:1417: tadyatsvasya goṣūdyacati | yadvai puruṣātparāgbhavati yaśo vā kiṃcidvā svaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1421: tasmai tāvanmātrīrvā bhūyasīrvā pratidadāti | na vā eṣa krūrakarmaṇe bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1422: yadyajamānaḥ krūramiva vā etatkaroti yadāha jināmīmāḥ kurva imā iti tatho
GV03sb_05_u:1423: hāsyaitadakrūraṃ kṛtam bhavati tasmāttāvanmātrīrvā bhūyasīrvā pratidadāti
GV03sb_05_u:1425: atha dakṣiṇānāyacati | so 'greṇa yūpaṃ dakṣiṇena vediṃ yenaiva dakṣiṇā yanti tena
GV03sb_05_u:1428: mā na indra te vayaṃ turāṣāṭ | ayuktāso abrahmatā vidasāma tiṣṭhā rathamadhi yaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1430: raśmayastasmādāhā raśmīndeva yamase svaśvānityatha rathavimocanīyāni juhoti
GV03sb_05_u:1431: prīto ratho vimucyātā iti tasmādrathavimocanīyāni juhoti
GV03sb_05_u:1433: sa juhoti | agnaye gṛhapataye svāheti sa yadevāgneyaṃ rathasya tadevaitena prīṇāti
GV03sb_05_u:1434: vahā vā āgneyā rathasya vahānevaitena prīṇāti śrīrvai gārhapataṃ yāvato-yāvata īṣṭe
GV03sb_05_u:1437: somāya vanaspataye svāheti | dvayāni vai vānaspatyāni cakrāṇi rathyāni cānasāni ca
GV03sb_05_u:1438: tebhyo nvevaitadubhayebhyo 'riṣṭiṃ kurute somo vai vanaspatiḥ sa yadeva
GV03sb_05_u:1439: vānaspatyaṃ rathasya tadevaitena prīṇāti dārūṇi vai vānaspatyāni rathasya
GV03sb_05_u:1440: dārūṇyevaitena prīṇāti kṣatraṃ vai somaḥ kṣatramevāsyaitadrājyamabhivimucyate
GV03sb_05_u:1442: marutāmojase svāheti | sa yadeva mārutaṃ rathasya tadevaitena prīṇāti catvāro 'śvā
GV03sb_05_u:1443: rathaḥ pañcamo dvau savyaṣṭhṛsārathī te sapta sapta-sapta va māruto gaṇaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1444: sarvamevaitena ratham prīṇāti viśo vai maruto viśamevāsyaitadrājyamabhivimucyate
GV03sb_05_u:1446: indrasyendriyāya svāheti | sa yadevaindraṃ rathasya tadevaitena prīṇāti savyaṣṭhā vā
GV03sb_05_u:1447: aindro rathasya savyaṣṭhāramevaitena prīṇātīndriyaṃ vai vīryamindra
GV03sb_05_u:1450: atha vārāhyā upānahā upamuñcate | agnau ha vai devā ghṛtakumbham praveśayāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1451: cakrustato varāhaḥ sambabhūva tasmādvarāho meduro ghṛtāddhi
GV03sb_05_u:1455: athemām pratyavekṣamāṇo japati | pṛthivi mātarmā mā hiṃsīrmo ahaṃ tvāmiti
GV03sb_05_u:1456: varuṇāddha vā abhiṣiṣicānātpṛthivī bibhayāṃ cakāra mahadvā ayamabhūdyo
GV03sb_05_u:1457: 'bhyaṣeci yadvai māyaṃ nāvadṛṇīyāditi varuṇa u ha pṛthivyai bibhayāṃ cakāra yadvai
GV03sb_05_u:1458: meyaṃ nāvadhūnvīteti tadanayaivaitanmitradheyamakuruta na hi mātā putraṃ hinasti
GV03sb_05_u:1461: varuṇasavo vā eṣa yadrājasūyam | pṛthivyu haitasmādbibheti mahadvā ayamabhūdyo
GV03sb_05_u:1462: 'bhyaṣeci yadvai māyaṃ nāvadṛṇīyādityeṣa u hāsyai bibheti yadvai meyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1463: nāvadhūnvīteti tadanayaivaitanmitradheyaṃ kurute na hi mātā putraṃ hinasti na
GV03sb_05_u:1467: nṛṣadvarasadṛtasadvyomasadabjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtam bṛhadityetāmaticandasaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1468: japanneṣā vai sarvāṇi candāṃsi yadaticandāstathainam pāpmā nānvavatiṣṭhati
GV03sb_05_u:1470: taṃ na saṃgrahītānvavatiṣṭhet | nettaṃ lokamanvavatiṣṭhādyaṃ suṣuvāṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1471: 'nvavāsthāditi taṃ sarathameva rathavāhana ādadhati tato 'vāṅapapravate tathā taṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1478: dhehi yuṅṅasi varco mayi dhehīti tadāyurvarca ātmandhatte
GV03sb_05_u:1480: athaudumbarīṃ śākhāmupaspṛśati | ūrgasyūrjam mayi dhehīti tadūrjamātmandhatte
GV03sb_05_u:1481: tasyaitasya karmaṇa etāveva śatamānau pravṛttau dakṣiṇā tau brahmaṇe dadāti
GV03sb_05_u:1482: brahmā hi yajñaṃ dakṣiṇato 'bhigopāyati tasmāttau brahmaṇe dadāti
GV03sb_05_u:1484: agreṇa maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyam | maitrāvaruṇī payasyā nihitā bhavati tāmasya bāhū
GV03sb_05_u:1485: abhyupāvaharatīndrasya vāṃ vīryakṛto bāhū abhyupāvaharāmīti paśūnāṃ vā eṣa raso
GV03sb_05_u:1487: bhavati mitrāvaruṇā u hi bāhū tasmānmaitrāvaruṇī bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1489: maitrāvaruṇyā payasyayā pracarati | tasyā aniṣṭa eva sviṣṭakṛdbhavatyathāsmā
GV03sb_05_u:1490: āsandīmāharantyuparisadyaṃ vā eṣa jayati yo jayatyantarikṣasadyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1491: tadenamuparyāsīnamadhastādimāḥ prajā upāsate tasmādasmā āsandīmāharanti saiṣā
GV03sb_05_u:1492: khādirī vitṛṇā bhavati yeyaṃ vardhravyutā bharatānām
GV03sb_05_u:1494: tāmagreṇa | maitrāvaruṇasya dhiṣṇyaṃ nidadhāti syonāsi suṣadāsīti
GV03sb_05_u:1497: athādhīvāsamāstṛṇāti | kṣatrasya yonirasīti tadyaiva kṣatrasya yonistāmevaitatkaroti
GV03sb_05_u:1502: athāntarāṃse 'bhimṛśya japati | niṣasāda ghṛtavrata iti ghṛtavrato vai rājā na vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1503: sarvasmā iva vadanāya na sarvasmā iva karmaṇe yadeva sādhu vadedyatsādhu
GV03sb_05_u:1504: kuryāttasmai vā eṣa ca śrotriyaścaitau ha vai dvau manuṣyeṣu ghṛtavratau
GV03sb_05_u:1505: tasmādāha niṣasāda ghṛtavrata iti varuṇaḥ pastyāsveti viśo vai pastyā
GV03sb_05_u:1506: vikṣvetyevaitadāha sāmrājyāya sukraturiti rājyāyetyevaitadāha yadāha sāmrājyāya
GV03sb_05_u:1509: athāsmai pañcākṣānpāṇāvāvapati abhibhūrasyetāste pañca diśaḥ kalpantāmityeṣa vā
GV03sb_05_u:1511: diśaḥ kalpantāmiti pañca vai diśastadasmai sarvā eva diśaḥ kalpayati
GV03sb_05_u:1516: atha varaṃ vṛṇīte | yaṃ ha vai kaṃ ca suṣuvāṇo varaṃ vṛṇīte so 'smai sarvaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1520: brahmaprasūtāṃ vācaṃ vadānīti tasmādbrahmannityeva prathamamāmantrayate tvam
GV03sb_05_u:1521: brahmāsītītaraḥ pratyāha savitāsi satyaprasava iti vīryamevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_05_u:1524: brahmannityeva dvitīyamāmantrayate | tvam brahmāsītītaraḥ pratyāha varuṇo 'si
GV03sb_05_u:1525: satyaujā iti vīryamevāsminnetaddadhāti varuṇameva satyaujasaṃ karoti
GV03sb_05_u:1527: brahmannityeva tṛtīyamāmantrayate | tvam brahmāsītītaraḥ pratyāhendro 'si viśaujā
GV03sb_05_u:1530: brahmannityeva caturthamāmantrayate | tvam brahmāsītītaraḥ pratyāha rudro 'si
GV03sb_05_u:1539: atha sumaṅgalanāmānaṃ hvayati | bahukāra śreyaskara bhūyaskareti ya evaṃnāmā
GV03sb_05_u:1542: athāsmai brāhmaṇa sphyam prayacati | adhvaryurvā yo vāsya purohito
GV03sb_05_u:1543: bhavatīndrasya vajro 'si tena me radhyeti vajro vai sphyaḥ sa etena vajreṇa brāhmaṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1544: rājānamātmano 'balīyāṃsaṃ kurute yo vai rājā brāhmaṇādabalīyānamitrebhyo vai sa
GV03sb_05_u:1547: taṃ rājā rājabhrātre prayacati | indrasya vajro 'si tena me radhyeti tena rājā
GV03sb_05_u:1550: taṃ rājabhrātā sūtāya vā sthapataye vā prayacati | indrasya vajro 'si tena me radhyeti
GV03sb_05_u:1551: tena rājabhrātā sūtaṃ vā sthapatiṃ vātmano 'balīyāṃsaṃ kurute
GV03sb_05_u:1553: taṃ sūto vā sthapatirvā grāmaṇye prayacati | indrasya vajro 'si tena me radhyeti tena
GV03sb_05_u:1556: taṃ grāmaṇīḥ sajātāya prayacati | indrasya vajro 'si tena me radhyeti tena grāmaṇīḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1560: atha sajātaśca pratiprasthātā ca | etena saphyena pūrvāgnau śukrasya
GV03sb_05_u:1563: atha manthinaḥ purorucā vimitaṃ viminutaḥ | ādyo vai manthī
GV03sb_05_u:1567: athādhvaryuḥ | caturgṛhītamājyaṃ gṛhītvādhidevane hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya juhotyagniḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1572: yadakṣāstamevaitena prīṇāti tasya ha vā eṣānumatā gṛheṣu hanyate yo vā rājasūyena
GV03sb_05_u:1573: yajate yo vaitadevaṃ vedaiteṣvakṣeṣvāha gāṃ dīvyadhvamiti pūrvāgnivāhau dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:1575: athāhāgnaye sviṣṭakṛte 'nubrūhīti | tadyadantareṇāhutī etatkarma kriyata eṣa vai
GV03sb_05_u:1576: prajāpatirya eṣa yajñastāyate yasmādimāḥ prajāḥ prajātā etamvevāpyetarhyanu
GV03sb_05_u:1577: prajāyante tadenam madhyata evaitasya prajāpaterdadhāti madhyataḥ suvati
GV03sb_05_u:1578: tasmādantareṇāhutī etatkarma kriyata āśrāvyāhāgniṃ sviṣṭakṛtaṃ yajeti vaṣaṭkṛte
GV03sb_05_u:1581: atheḍāmādadhāti | upahūtāyāmiḍāyāmapa upaspṛśya māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhṇāti
GV03sb_05_u:1582: māhendraṃ grahaṃ gṛhītvā stotramupākaroti taṃ stotrāya pramīvati sa upāvarohati so
GV03sb_05_u:1585: varuṇāddha vā abhiṣiṣicānādbhargo 'pacakrāma | vīryaṃ vai bharga eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1586: viṣṇuryajñaḥ so 'smādapacakrāma śaśvadya eṣo 'pāṃ rasaḥ sambhṛto bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1589: tametābhirdevatābhiranusamasarpat | savitrā prasavitrā sarasvatyā vācā tvaṣṭrā rūpaiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1590: pūṣṇaḥ paśubhirindreṇāsme bṛhaspatinā brahmaṇā varuṇenaujasāgninā tejasā somena
GV03sb_05_u:1597: tadāhuḥ | daśa pitāmahāntsomapāntsakhyāya prasarpettatho hāsya somapīthamaśnute
GV03sb_05_u:1598: daśapeyo hīti tadvai jyā dvau trīnityeva pitāmahāntsomapānvindanti tasmādetā eva
GV03sb_05_u:1601: etābhirvai devatābhirvaruṇa etasya somapīthamāśnuta | tatho evaiṣa etābhireva
GV03sb_05_u:1602: devatābhiretasya somapīthamaśnute tasmādetā eva devatāḥ saṃkhyāya prasarpedatha
GV03sb_05_u:1605: athaitāni havīṃṣi nirvapati | sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ vāṣṭākapālaṃ vā puroḍāśaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1606: savitā vai devānām prasavitā savitṛprasūta eva tadvaruṇo 'nusamasarpattatho evaiṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1609: atha sārasvataṃ caruṃ nirvapati | vāgvai sarasvatī vācaiva tadvaruṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1612: atha tvāṣṭraṃ daśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati | tvaṣṭā vai rūpāṇāmīṣṭe
GV03sb_05_u:1616: atha pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ nirvapati | paśavo vai pūṣā paśubhireva tadvaruṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1620: athaindramekādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati | indriyaṃ vai vīryamindra
GV03sb_05_u:1624: atha bārhaspatyaṃ caruṃ nirvapati | brahma vai bṛhaspatirbrahmaṇaiva tadvaruṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1628: atha vāruṇaṃ yavamayaṃ caruṃ nirvapati | sa yenaivaujasemāḥ prajā varuṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1632: upasado daśamyo devatāḥ | tatra pañca puṇḍarīkāṇyupaprayacati tāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1633: dvādaśapuṇḍarīkāṃ sraja pratimuñcate sā dīkṣā tayā dīkṣayā dīkṣate
GV03sb_05_u:1635: atha yaddvādaśa bhavanti | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya sarvaṃ vai saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1636: sarveṇaivainametaddīkṣayati yāni puṇḍarīkāṇi tāni divo rūpaṃ tāni nakṣatrāṇāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1637: rūpaṃ ye vadhakāste 'ntarikṣasya rūpaṃ yāni bisāni tānyasyai tadenameṣu
GV03sb_05_u:1640: atha rājānaṃ krītvā | dvedhopanahya parivahanti tato 'rdhamāsandyāmāsādya
GV03sb_05_u:1641: pracaratyatha ya eṣo 'rdho brahmaṇo gṛhe nihito bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1645: athaitāni havīṃṣi nirvapati | āgneyamaṣṭākapālam puroḍāśaṃ saumyaṃ caruṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1646: vaiṣṇavaṃ trikapālaṃ vā puroḍāśaṃ caruṃ vā tena yatheṣṭyaivaṃ yajate
GV03sb_05_u:1648: tadu tathā na kuryāt | hvalati vā eṣa yo yajñapathādetyeti vā eṣa yajñapathādya
GV03sb_05_u:1651: sa yadagniṃ yajati | agninaivaitattejasānusaṃsarpatyatha yatsomaṃ yajati
GV03sb_05_u:1652: somenaivaitadrājñānusaṃsarpatyatha yadviṣṇuṃ yajati yajño vai viṣṇustadyajñam
GV03sb_05_u:1655: sa eṣa saptadaśo 'gniṣṭomo bhavati | saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1658: tasya dvādaśa prathamagarbhāḥ paṣṭhauhyo dakṣiṇā | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1666: tā brahmaṇe dadāti | brahmā hi yajñaṃ dakṣiṇato 'bhigopāyati tasmāttā brahmaṇe
GV03sb_05_u:1667: dadāti hiraṇmayīṃ srajamudgātre rukmaṃ hotre hiraṇmayau
GV03sb_05_u:1672: tā vā etāḥ | dvādaśa vā trayodaśa vā dakṣiṇā bhavanti dvādaśa vā vai trayodaśa vā
GV03sb_05_u:1676: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati | tam pūrvārdha āsādayatyaindra
GV03sb_05_u:1677: ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati saumyo vā carustaṃ dakṣiṇārdha āsādayati
GV03sb_05_u:1678: vaiśvadevaścarurbhavati tam paścārdha āsādayati maitrāvaruṇī payasyā bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1679: tāmuttarārdha āsādayati bārhaspatyaścarurbhavati tam madhya āsādayatyeṣa caruḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1680: pañcabilastadyatpañca havīṃṣi bhavanti teṣām pañca bilāni tasmāccaruḥ pañcabilo
GV03sb_05_u:1683: tadyadetena rājasūyayājī yajate | yadevainaṃ diśaḥ samārohayati
GV03sb_05_u:1685: rājasūyayājī na yajetodvā ha mādyetpra vā patettasmādvā etena rājasūyayājī yajate
GV03sb_05_u:1687: sa yadāgneyenāṣṭākapālena puroḍāśena pracarati | yadevainam prācīṃ diśaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1691: atha yadaindreṇaikādaśakapālena puroḍāśena pracarati | saumyena vā caruṇā
GV03sb_05_u:1695: atha yadvaiśvadevena caruṇā pracarati | yadevainam pratīcīṃ diśaṃ samārohayati
GV03sb_05_u:1699: atha yanmaitrāvaruṇyā payasyāyā pracarati | yadevainamudīcīṃ diśaṃ samārohayati
GV03sb_05_u:1702: evāsminnetadannādyaṃ dadhāti tasmādu diśo-diśa eva rājñe 'nnādyamabhihriyate
GV03sb_05_u:1704: atha yadbārhaspatyena caruṇā pracarati | yadevainamūrdhvāṃ diśaṃ samārohayati
GV03sb_05_u:1707: sa ya eṣa āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ pūroḍāśo bhavati | tasya hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇāgneyo vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1708: yajño bhavatyagne reto hiraṇyaṃ tasmāddhiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā tadagnīdhe dadātyagnirvā
GV03sb_05_u:1711: atha ya eṣa aindra ekādaśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati | tasyarṣabho dakṣiṇā sa
GV03sb_05_u:1712: haindro yadṛṣabho yadyu saumyaścarurbhavati tasya babhrurgaurdakṣiṇā sa hi
GV03sb_05_u:1713: saumyo yadbabhrustam brahmaṇe dadāti brahmā hi yajñaṃ dakṣiṇato 'bhigopāyati
GV03sb_05_u:1716: atha ya eṣa vaiśvadevaścarurbhavati | tasya pṛṣangaurdakṣiṇā bhūmā vā etadrūpāṇāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1717: yatpṛṣato gorviśo vai viśve devā bhūmā vai viṭtasmātpṛṣangaurdakṣiṇā taṃ hotre
GV03sb_05_u:1718: dadāti hotā hi bhūmā tasmāttaṃ hotre dadāti
GV03sb_05_u:1720: atha yaiṣā maitrāvaruṇī payasyā bhavati | tasyai vaśā dakṣiṇā sā hi maitrāvaruṇī
GV03sb_05_u:1721: yadvaśā yadi vaśāṃ na vindedapi yaiva kā cāpravītā syātsarvā hyeva vaśāpravītā
GV03sb_05_u:1722: tāmadhvaryubhyāṃ dadāti prāṇodānau vā adhvaryū prāṇodānau mitrāvaruṇau
GV03sb_05_u:1725: atha ya eṣa bārhaspatyaścarurbhavati | tasya śitipṛṣṭho gaurdakṣiṇaiṣā vā ūrdhvā
GV03sb_05_u:1727: dakṣiṇā tam brahmaṇe dadāti bṛhaspatirvai devānām brahmaiṣa vā etasya brahmā
GV03sb_05_u:1728: bhavati tasmāttam brahmaṇe dadāti sa haitenāpi viṣṭhāvrājyannādyakāmo yajeta
GV03sb_05_u:1729: tadasmintsarvato 'nnādyaṃ dadhāti sa hānnāda eva bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1731: sa vai prayujāṃ havirbhiryajate | tadyatprayujāṃ havirbhiryajata ṛtūnvā etatsuṣuvāṇo
GV03sb_05_u:1732: yuṅkte ta enamṛtavo yuktā vahantyṛtūnvā prayuktānanucarati tasmātprayujāṃ
