GV03sb_05_u:1735: tāni vai dvādaśa bhavanti | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya tasmāddvādaśa bhavanti
GV03sb_05_u:1736: māsi-māsi yajetetyāhuḥ ko veda manuṣyasya tasmānna māsi-māsi yajeta
GV03sb_05_u:1737: śamyāparāvyādhe śamyāparāvyādha eva ṣaḍbhiryajate prāṅ yānatha punarāvṛttaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1740: tadu tathā na kuryāt | ṣaḍevaitāni pūrvāṇi havīṃṣi nirvapati samānabarhīṃṣi tāsāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1741: devatānāṃ rūpaṃ yathā śiśire yuktvā prāñca āprāvṛṣaṃ yāyustatṣaḍṛtūnyūṅkte ta enaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1742: ṣaḍṛtavo yuktāḥ prāñca āpravṛṣaṃ vahanti ṣaḍvartūnprayuktānāprāvṛṣamanucarati
GV03sb_05_u:1745: ṣaḍevottarāṇi havīṃṣi nirvapati | samānabarhīṃṣi tāsāṃ devatānāṃ rūpaṃ yathā
GV03sb_05_u:1746: punarāvarteranvārṣikamabhi tatṣaḍṛtūnyuṅkte ta enaṃ ṣaḍṛtavo yuktā
GV03sb_05_u:1748: dakṣiṇā tadyatpūrvāgnivāho dakṣiṇa 'rtūnvā etatsuṣavāṇo yuṅkte vahanti vā
GV03sb_05_u:1751: taddha smaitatpurā kurupañcālā āhuḥ | ṛtavo vā asmānyuktā vahantyṛtūnvā
GV03sb_05_u:1752: prayuktānanucarāma iti yadeṣāṃ rājāno rājasūyayājina āsustaddha sma tadabhyāhuḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1754: āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālaḥ puroḍāśo bhavati | saumyaścaruḥ sāvitro dvādaśakapālo
GV03sb_05_u:1755: vāṣṭākapālo vā puroḍāśo bārhaspatyaścarustvāṣṭro daśakapālaḥ puroḍāśo
GV03sb_05_u:1756: vaiśvānaro dvādaśakapāla etāni ṣaṭ pūrvāṇi havīṃṣi bhavanti
GV03sb_05_u:1761: atha śyenīṃ vicitragarbhāmadityā ālabhate | tasyā eṣaivāvṛdyāṣṭāpadyai vaśāyā iyaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1762: vā aditirasyā evainametadgarbhaṃ karoti tasyā etādṛśyeva śyenī vicitragarbhā dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:1764: atha pṛṣatīṃ vicitracarbhām marudbhya ālabhate | tasyā eṣaivāvṛdviśo vai maruto
GV03sb_05_u:1765: viśāmevainametadgarbhaṃ karoti tasyāṃ etādṛśyeva pṛṣatī vicitragarbhā dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:1767: etau paśubandhau | tadetāveva santāvanyathevālabhante yāmadityā ālabhanta
GV03sb_05_u:1768: ādityebhyastāmālabhante sarvaṃ vā ādityāḥ sarvasyaivainametadgarbhaṃ karoti yām
GV03sb_05_u:1769: marudbhya ālabhante viśvebhyastāṃ devebhya ālabhante sarvaṃ vai viśve devāḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1772: abhiṣecanīyeneṣṭvā | keśānna vapate tadyatkeśānna vapate vīryaṃ vā etadapāṃ rasaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1777: saṃvatsaraṃ na vapate | saṃvatsarasammitā vai vratacaryā tasmātsaṃvatsaraṃ na vapate
GV03sb_05_u:1778: sa eṣa vratavisarjanīyopayogo nāma stomo bhavati keśavapanīyaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1780: tasyaikaviṃśam prātaḥsavanam | saptadaśam mādhyandinaṃ savanam pañcadaśaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1781: tṛtīyasavanaṃ sahokthaiḥ saha ṣoḍaśinā saha rātryā
GV03sb_05_u:1783: trivṛdrāthantaraḥ saṃdhirbhavati | eṣa evaikaviṃśo ya eṣa tapati sa
GV03sb_05_u:1787: tasya rathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati | iyaṃ vai rathantaramasyāmevaitatpratiṣṭhāyām
GV03sb_05_u:1788: pratitiṣṭhatyatirātro bhavati pratiṣṭhā vā atirātrastasmādatirātro bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1790: sa vai nyeva vartayate keśānna vapate vīryaṃ vā etadapāṃ rasaḥ sambhṛto bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1793: tadātmanyevaitāṃ śriyaṃ niyunakti tasmānnyeva vartayate keśānna vapate tasyaiṣaiva
GV03sb_05_u:1796: āsandyā upānahā upamuñcate | upānaḍbhyāmadhi yadasya yānam bhavati ratho vā
GV03sb_05_u:1797: kiṃcidvā sarvaṃ vā eṣa idamuparyupari bhavatyarvāgevāsmādidaṃ sarvam bhavati yo
GV03sb_05_u:1798: rājasūyena yajate tasmādasyaiṣaiva vratacaryā bhavati yāvajjīvaṃ nāsyām
GV03sb_05_u:1801: śyeta āśvino bhavati | śyetāviva hyaśvināvavirmalhā sārasvatī
GV03sb_05_u:1802: bhavatyṛṣabhamindrāya sṛtrāmṇa ālabhate durvedā evaṃsamṛddhāḥ paśavo
GV03sb_05_u:1803: yadyevaṃsamṛddhānna vindedapyajānevālabheraṃste hi suśrapatarā bhavanti sa
GV03sb_05_u:1806: tvaṣṭurha vai putraḥ | triṣīrṣā ṣaḍakṣa āsa tasya trīṇyeva
GV03sb_05_u:1810: tamindro didveṣa tasya tāni śīrṣāṇi praciceda
GV03sb_05_u:1812: sa yatsomapānamāsa | tataḥ kapiñjalaḥ samabhavattasmātsa babhruka iva babhruriva
GV03sb_05_u:1815: atha yatsurāpāṇamāsa | tataḥ kalaviṅkaḥ samabhavattasmātso 'bhimādyatka iva
GV03sb_05_u:1818: atha yadatyasmā aśanāyāsa | tatastittiriḥ samabhavattasmātsa viśvarūpatama iva
GV03sb_05_u:1819: santyeva ghṛtastokā iva tvanmadhustokā iva tvatparṇeṣvāścutitā evaṃrūpamiva hi sa
GV03sb_05_u:1822: sa tvaṣṭā cukrodha | kuvinme putramabadhīditi so 'pendrameva somamājahre sa
GV03sb_05_u:1825: indro ha vā īkṣāṃ cakre | idaṃ vai mā somādantaryantīti sa yathā balīyānabalīyasa
GV03sb_05_u:1826: evamanupahūta eva yo droṇakalaśe śukra āsa tam bhakṣayāṃ cakāra sa hainaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1827: jihiṃsa so 'sya viṣvaṅṅeva prāṇebhyo dudrāva mukhāddhaivāsya na dudrāva
GV03sb_05_u:1828: tasmātprāyaścittirāsa sa yaddhāpi mukhādadroṣyanna haiva prāyaścittirabhaviṣyat
GV03sb_05_u:1830: catvāro vai varṇāḥ | brāhmaṇo rājanyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro na haiteṣāmekaścana bhavati yaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1831: somaṃ vamati sa yaddhaiteṣāmekaścitsyā tasyāddhaiva prāyaścittiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1833: sa yannasto 'dravat | tataḥ siṃhaḥ samabhavadatha yatkarṇābhyāmadravattato kṛkaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1836: kuvalaṃ karkandhu badaramiti samabhavatsa sarveṇaiva vyārdhyata sarvaṃ hi somaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1838: sa somātipūto maṅkuriva cacāra | tametayāśvināvabhiṣajyatāṃ taṃ sarveṇaiva
GV03sb_05_u:1839: samārdhayatāṃ sarvaṃ hi somaḥ sa vasīyāneveṣṭvābhavat
GV03sb_05_u:1841: te devā abruvan | sutrātam batainamatrāsatāmiti tasmātsautrāmaṇī nāma
GV03sb_05_u:1843: sa haitayāpi somātipūtam bhiṣajyet | sarveṇa vā eṣa vyṛdhyate yaṃ somo 'tipavate
GV03sb_05_u:1844: sarvaṃ hi somastaṃ sarveṇaiva samardhayati sarvaṃ hi somaḥ sa vasīyāneveṣṭvā
GV03sb_05_u:1847: tadyadetayā rājasūyayājī yajate | savānvā eṣa yajñakratūnavarunddhe sarvā iṣṭīrapi
GV03sb_05_u:1848: darvihomānyo rājasūyena yajate devasṛṣṭā vā eṣeṣṭiryatsautrāmaṇyanayā me
GV03sb_05_u:1849: 'pīṣṭamasadanayāpi sūyā iti tasmādvā etayā rājasūyayājī yajate
GV03sb_05_u:1851: atha yadāśvino bhavati | aśvinau vā enamabhiṣajyatāṃ tatho evainameṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1854: atha yatsārasvato bhavati | vāgvai sarasvatī vācā vā enamaśvināvabhiṣajyatāṃ tatho
GV03sb_05_u:1857: atha yadaindro bhavati indro vai yajñasya devatā tayaivainametadbhiṣajyati
GV03sb_05_u:1860: eteṣu paśuṣu | siṃhalomāni vṛkalomāni śārdūlalomānītyāvapatyetadvai tataḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1864: tadu tathā na kuryāt | ulkayā ha sa nakhinyā paśūnanuṣuvati ya etāni paśuṣvāvapati
GV03sb_05_u:1865: tasmādu parisrutyevāvapettathā holkayā nakhinyā paśūnnānuṣuvati tatho evainaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1868: atha pūrvedyuḥ | parisrutaṃ saṃdadhātyāśvibhyām pacyasva sarasvatyai
GV03sb_05_u:1869: pacyasvendrāya sutrāmṇe pacyasveti sā yadā parisrudbhavatyathainayā pracarati
GV03sb_05_u:1876: tāṃ darbhaiḥ pāvayati | pūtāsaditi vāyuḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somo atisrutaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1882: atha grahāngṛhṇāti | ekaṃ vā trīnvaikastveva grahītavya ekā hi
GV03sb_05_u:1885: sa gṛhṇāti | kuvidaṅga yavamanto yavaṃ cidyathā dāntyanupūrvaṃ viyūya ihehaiṣāṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1886: kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namauktiṃ yajanti upayāmagṛhīto 'syaśvibhyāṃ tvā
GV03sb_05_u:1887: sarasvatyai tvendrāya tvā sutrāmṇa iti yadyu trīngṛhṇīyādetayaiva
GV03sb_05_u:1888: gṛhṇīyādupayāmaistu tarhi nānā gṛhṇīyādathāhāśvibhyām sarasvatyā indrāya
GV03sb_05_u:1892: so 'nvāha | yuvaṃ surāmamaśvinā namucāvāsure sacā vipipānā subhaspatī indraṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1895: sa yajati | putramiva pitarāvaśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyairdaṃsanābhiḥ yatsurāmaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1896: vyapibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavannabhiṣṇagiti dvirhotā vaṣaṭkaroti
GV03sb_05_u:1900: atha kumbhaḥ | śatavitṛṇo vā bhavati navavitṛṇo vā sa yadi śatavitṛṇaḥ śatāyurvā ayam
GV03sb_05_u:1901: puruṣaḥ śatatejāḥ śatavīryastasmācatavitṛṇo yadyu navavitṛṇo naveme puruṣe
GV03sb_05_u:1904: taṃ śikyodutam | uparyuparyāhavanīyaṃ dhārayanti sā yā pariśiṣṭā parisrudbhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1905: tāmāsiñcati tāṃ vikṣarantīmupatiṣṭhate pitṝṇāṃ somavatāṃ tisṛbhirṛgbhiḥ pitṝṇām
GV03sb_05_u:1907: tisṛbhirṛgbhistadyadevamupatiṣṭhate yatra vai soma indramatyapavata sa
GV03sb_05_u:1911: athaitāni havīṃṣi nirvapati | sāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ vāṣṭākapālaṃ vā puroḍāśaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1914: sa yatsāvitro bhavati | savitā vai devānām prasavitā savitṛprasūta evaitadbhiṣajyati
GV03sb_05_u:1917: atha yadvāruṇo bhavati | varuṇo vā ārpayitā tadya evārpayitā tenaivaitadbhiṣajyati
GV03sb_05_u:1920: atha yadaindro bhavati | indro vai yajñasya devatā sā yaiva yajñasya devatā
GV03sb_05_u:1923: sa yadi haitayāpi somātipūtam bhiṣajyet | iṣṭā anuyājā bhavantyavyūḍhe
GV03sb_05_u:1925: medhenāpidadhātyāśvinamu tarhi dvikapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapedatha yadā
GV03sb_05_u:1928: tadu tathā na kuryāt | hvalati vā eṣa yo yajñapathādetyeti vā eṣa yajñapathādya evaṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1929: karoti tasmādyatraivaiteṣām paśūnāṃ vapābhiḥ pracaranti tadevaitairhavirbhiḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1932: tasya napuṃsako gaurdakṣiṇā | na vā eṣa strī na pumānyannapuṃsako gauryadaha
GV03sb_05_u:1933: pumāṃstena na strī yadu strī teno na pumāṃstasmānnapuṃsako gaurdakṣiṇāśvā vā
GV03sb_05_u:1934: rathavāhī sā hi na strī na pumānyadaśvā rathavāhī yadaha rathaṃ vahati tena na strī
GV03sb_05_u:1935: yadu strī teno na pumāṃstasmādaśvā rathavāhī dakṣiṇā
GV03sb_05_u:1937: aindravaiṣṇavaṃ dvādaśakapālam puroḍāśaṃ nirvapati | tadyadetayā yajate vṛtre ha
GV03sb_05_u:1938: vā idamagre sarvanāma yadṛco yadyajūṃṣi yatsāmāni tasmā indro vajram prājihīrṣat
GV03sb_05_u:1940: sa ha viṣṇumuvāca | vṛtrāya vai vajram prahariṣyāmyanu mā tiṣṭhasveti tatheti ha
GV03sb_05_u:1941: viṣṇuruvācānu tvā sthāsye prahareti tasmā indro vajramudyayāma sa
GV03sb_05_u:1944: sa hovāca | asti vā idaṃ vīryaṃ tannu te prayacāni mā tu me prahārṣīriti tasmai
GV03sb_05_u:1947: sa hovāca | asti vā idaṃ vīryaṃ tannu te prayacāni mā tu me prahārṣīriti tasmā ṛcaḥ
GV03sb_05_u:1950: asti vā idaṃ vīryaṃ tannu te prayacāni mā tu me prahāṣīriti tasmai sāmāni
GV03sb_05_u:1958: atha yadaindrāvaiṣṇavaṃ havirbhavati | indro hi vajramudayacadviṣṇuranvatiṣṭhata
GV03sb_05_u:1960: atha yaddvādaśakapālo bhavati | dvādaśa vai māsāḥ saṃvatsarasya
GV03sb_05_u:1964: tadyajuṣāṃ rūpamatha yavamayaṃ tadṛcāṃ rūpamatha vrīhimayaṃ tatsāmnāṃ rūpa
GV03sb_05_u:1965: tadetattrayyai vidyāyai rūpaṃ kriyate saiṣā rājasūyayājina udavasānīyeṣṭirbhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1967: sarvānvā eṣa yajñakratūnavarunddhe | sarvā iṣṭīrapi darvihomānyo rājasūyena yajate
GV03sb_05_u:1968: tasya yātayāmeva yajño bhavati so 'smātparāṅiva bhavatyetāvānvai sarvo yajño
GV03sb_05_u:1969: yāvāneṣa trayo vedastasyaitadrūpaṃ kriyata eṣa yonirāśayastadetena trayeṇa vedena
GV03sb_05_u:1970: punaryajñamārabhate tathāsyāyātayāmā yajño bhavati tatho asmānna parāṅ bhavati
GV03sb_05_u:1972: sarvānvā eṣa yajñakratūnavarunddhe | sarvā iṣṭīrapi darvihomānyo rājasūyena yajate
GV03sb_05_u:1973: devasṛṣṭo vā eṣeṣṭiryattraidhātavyanayā me 'pīṣṭamasadanayāpi sūyā iti tasmādvā
GV03sb_05_u:1976: atho yaḥ sahasraṃ vā bhūyo vā dadyāt | tasya hāpyudavasānīyā syādriricāna iva vā eṣa
GV03sb_05_u:1977: bhavati yaḥ sahasraṃ vā bhūyo vā dadātyetadvai sahasraṃ vācaḥ prajātaṃ yadeṣa trayo
GV03sb_05_u:1978: vedastatsahasreṇa riricānam punarāpyāyayati tasmādu ha tasyāpyudavasānīyā syāt
GV03sb_05_u:1980: atho ye dīrghasattramāsīran | saṃvatsaraṃ vā bhūyo vā teṣāṃ hāpyudavasānīya
GV03sb_05_u:1981: syātsarvaṃ vai teṣāmāptam bhavati sarvaṃ jitaṃ ye dīrghasattramāsate saṃvatsaraṃ vā
GV03sb_05_u:1982: bhūyo vā sarvameṣā tasmādu ha teṣāmapyudavasānīyā syāt
GV03sb_05_u:1985: kṣipraṃ kilāstṛṇuteti ha smāha yājñavalkyo 'pi ha vā enayendro
GV03sb_05_u:1986: vṛtrasyāsthānamacinadapi ha vā enayāsthānaṃ cinatti ya enayābhicarati tasmādu
GV03sb_05_u:1989: atho hainayāpi bhiṣajyet | yaṃ nvevaikayarcā bhiṣajyedekena yajuṣaikena sāmnā taṃ
GV03sb_05_u:1990: nvevāgadaṃ kuryātkimu yaṃ trayeṇa vedena tasmādu hainayāpi bhiṣajyet
GV03sb_05_u:1992: tasyai trīṇi śatamānāni hiraṇyāni dakṣiṇā | tāni brahmaṇe dadāti na vai brahmā
GV03sb_05_u:1993: pracarati na stute na śaṃsatyatha sa yaśo na vai hiraṇyena kiṃ cana kurvantyatha
GV03sb_05_u:1996: tisro dhenūrhotre | bhūmā vai tisro dhenavo bhūmā hotā tasmāttisro dhenūrhotre
GV03sb_05_u:1998: trīṇi vāsāṃsyadhvaryave | tanute vā adhvaryuryajñaṃ tanvate vāsāṃsi tasmāttrīṇi
GV03sb_05_u:2001: tā vā etāḥ | dvādaśa vā trayodaśa vā dakṣiṇā bhavanti dvādaśa vā vai trayodaśa vā
GV03sb_05_u:2002: saṃvatsarasya māsāḥ saṃvatsarasammitaiṣeṣṭistasmāddvādaśa vā trayodaśa vā
